loans.name: Consuelo De Jesús

texts.es:
A sus 65 años de edad, Consuelo es una mujer emprendedora que se rebusaca la vida con el propósito de salir adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida. Consuelo lleva más de 20 años produciendo la tradicional arepa antioqueña, las cuales vende entre sus clientes frecuentes, vecinos de la zona donde ya es reconocida. 

Incrementar sus ventas es el sueño de esta emprendedora que actualmente necesita de un préstamo para comprar un motor para moler el maíz lo que le permitirá agilizar su producción y hacer mayor número de arepas por día generando mayores ingresos.
texts.en: At 65 years of age, Consuelo is an enterprising woman who uses her wits to get ahead and improve her quality of life. For more than 20 years, Consuelo has produced traditional arepas [corn cakes] from Antioquia, which she sells to her regular customers, neighbors in the area where she is well-known. The dream of this entrepreneur is to increase her sales. In order to do so, she currently needs a loan to purchase a motor to grind corn which will enable her to speed up her production and make a larger number of arepas every day, thereby generating a greater income.

loans.use: to purchase a motor to grind corn.

loans.name: Lucerito De Jose Galvez Group

texts.es: Isabel tiene 57 años D. edad y tiene 2 hijos, la cual sigue apoyando al menor  D. ellos, la sra. Isabel lleva más D. 8 años  dedicándose  a la venta D. picarones y anticuchos la cual los venD. cerca a un parque D. su comunidad ya que es un lugar céntrico, ella comenzó ayudando a su madre quien también se dedicaba a dicho trabajo es así como llego a tener experiencia y decidió iniciar su propio negocio, Isabel es una mujer empeñosa que ha tenido  que trabajar arduamente para sacar adelante a sus hijos ya que nos cuenta que es madre soltera, aunque eso no fue obstáculo para seguir luchando cada día. El deseo D. Isabel es que sus hijos sean profesionales y crecer en su negocio, es por ello que solicito el préstamo para comprar insumos como harina, carne, azúcar, entre otros. Isabel es unas D. las integrantes D. la Alcancía Comunal “Lucerito D. José Gálvez” este grupo está conformado por 11 personas responsables, ellos agradecen la ayuda D. los prestamistas KIVA y se comprometen a seguir trabando bien.Los socios  JIMMY y  BERTHA no pudieron estar presente por motivo D. trabajo.
texts.en:
Isabel is 57 and has two children, the youngest of which is still in her care.  For over eight years she has been selling tid-bits and snacks near the community park which is in a central location.  She began helping her mother who had the same business, so she had ample experience when she decided to set up her own activity.  Isabel is a hard-working woman who has done her best to proviD. for her children.  She is a single mother but this has not been an obstacle in her daily struggle.

Isabel's dream is for her children to become professionals and for her business to grow.  She has requested a loan to buy flour, meat, sugar and other items.  She is a member of the communal bank "Lucerito D. José Gálvez" which is comprised of 11 responsible members.  They are grateful to the KIVA lenders and are committed to continue working well.  Members Jimmy and Bertha could not be present for the picture because of work.

loans.use: To buy ingredients such as flour, meat, sugar and others.

loans.name: Martha Lidia

texts.es: Martha Lidia tiene 54 años de edad, y junto a su esposo y a su hijo de 12 años reside en Barrio Belén en la Ciudad de Juticalpa. Ella se dedica a la venta de mercadería como ser calzado, ropa, lociones, cosméticos y otros productos de uso personal. Inició este negocio porque los ingresos de su esposo eran pocos y para ayudarlo decidió destinar una parte de su casa para instalar una pequeña tienda y así tener un ingreso extra que le permitiera llevar parte del sustento para la familia. Una de las desventajas que enfrenta es que su negocio está ubicado enfrente de una calle de tierra y dado a que el clima es muy caliente debe mantener la puerta de la tienda abierta y la mercadería se le llena de polvo. Martha solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como ropa interior y de vestir, zapatos, sandalias, cosmeticos, perfumes, entre otros. Con el apoyo de este préstamo podrá mantener su tienda bien surtida e incrementar sus ventas y así llevar el sustento a su hogar. Su meta es hacerle mejoras a su local para que el producto exhibido no se le dañe. Martha ha sido cliente de FAMA por tres ciclos y su comportamiento de pago es muy bueno, cabe mencionar que por su puntualidad ha sido premiada como una de las mejores clientas de la institución.
texts.en:
Martha Lidia is 54 and lives with her husband and 12-year-old son in the Belén quarter of the city of Juticalpa.  She sells merchandise such as shoes, clothing, lotions, cosmetics and other personal care items.  She started her business because her husband's salary was not enough to cover expenses and she decided to help out.  She organized part of her house to set up a small store to obtain extra income for the family.

One of the disadvantages of her business is that the store is located on a dirt road.  With the climate being very hot she must keep the door open and the merchandise then gets covered with dust.  Martha is requesting a loan to buy goods such as clothing and lingerie, shoes, sandals, cosmetics, perfumes and other items.  With the help of the loan she will be able to keep her store well stocked so she can increase sales and her household income.  Her goal is to make the necessary improvements to exhibit merchandise so it won't get damaged.  Martha has been a FAMA member for three cycles, always paying back the loans on time.  Because of her promptness she was awarded for being one of the institution's best customers.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as , , cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Diana María

texts.es:
Diana sabe que para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia, así como para ofrecerle un mejor futuro a su pequeña hija debe trabajar como independiente para ayudarle a su esposo a cubrir los gastos del hogar, es así, como desde hace dos años se dedica a la venta de productos por catálogo, lo que le permite generar sus propios ingresos. 

Una de sus dificultades ha sido que por falta de los recursos no ha tenido la oportunidad de comprar mercancía que en algunos meses llega en promoción, para ello, necesita de un crédito, pues en la medida en que pueda adquirir productos más económicos podrá obtener mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Diana knows that to improve her family's lifestyle and offer her small daughter a better future she must have her own income to help her husband cover household expenses.  So for two years now she has been selling products by catalogue.

One of the difficulties she has run into has been the lack of resources meaning she has not always been able to take advantage of sale items.  Therefore she is requesting a loan so she can purchase less expensive items and generate higher earnings.

loans.use: To buy catalogue products on sale.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.en:
Roxana is a member of "The Endeavour" Communal Bank from the city of Temuco, Chile. She is the owner of a general store that sells food products, household items, firewood, charcoal, and also has video game machines available for customers to play. She began her business 9 years ago by selling small goods.  Her business has prospered and she has been able to expand the merchandise.  A large part of her success has been because of serving a large number of dedicated customers.  When she first began to sell charcoal and firewood she had to learn to drive, so she would be able to transport the new products to her store.  

Her store is located in a leased location close to her home.  She buys the majority of her products from wholesalers in Temuco.  She will use the loan from Fondo Esperanza to buy merchandise for her store, as well and charcoal and firewood.  Her dreams are to continue to grow her business and have a building of her own so she no longer needs to rent space.  She has started with plans to construct a store as part of her house and is currently working on the details.  

Roxana is married and lives with her husband and two children.   Her daughter is 22 years old and studying to be a legal assistant, while her 15 year-old son is currently in high school. Another one of her dreams is to continue to expand her business so she can provide economic stability for her family and improve their quality of life.  

She is very happy and grateful for the services provided by Fondo Esperanza.  She enjoys the Communal Bank meetings and the other members and she feels there is trust and commitment to each other. As part of the training provided by FE she has learned to record her expenses and income, which has improved the organization of her business.  
 
Temuco is the capital of the region of Araucanía. The city is located 670 km south of Santiago (the capital of Chile). There are a number of lakes (Pucón, Villarrica) located nearby Temuco, as well as parks filled with striking fauna and flora. 50% of the Mapuche indigenous population also lives in this region.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise, coal, and firewood

loans.name: Angélica Yomaira

texts.es:
Angélica de 23 años vive en una localidad suburbana con caminos de tierra (Fortín en Guayaquil), decidió empezar haciendo comida para vender ya que en la zona no había competencia para ella. Su negocio lleva el nombre de su hija Diana. "Restaurante Dianita", aquí ella hace comidas rápida y almuerzos. 
Ella es madre soltera por lo que lucha sola con sus 2 hijos uno que tiene 5 años y el segundo 4 ambos estudiantes de primaria. 
El negocio lo mantiene en las afueras de su casa. Ya tiene su clientela definida y conocidos.
No ha tenido ninguna dificultad al momento de desarrollar sus actividades, se levanta muy temprano para limpiar el lugar y ordenar los alimentos.
Ella desea un préstamo, para comprar, cemento, arena y bloques para terminar de construir su negocio. Su sueño como toda madre es ver a sus pequeños hijos todos unos profesionales.
texts.en: Angélica is 23 years old and lives in a suburban town with dirt roads (Fortin en Guayaquil). She decided to make food to sell as there was no competition in the area. Her business is named "Restaurante Dianita" after her daughter Diana. She makes quick meals and lunches here. She is a single mother who struggles to raise her two children aged 2 and 5, both of who attend primary school. The restaurant is located outside her house. She already has a specific and known clientele. She has not encountered any difficulty in developing her business. She gets up very early to clean the place and order food. She wants the loan to buy cement, sand and building blocks to finish building her business. Her dream as every mother is to see her two young children grow up to be professionals.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement and bricks.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Desde las 7:00 de la mañana hasta las 10:00 de la noche, Gloria atiende su negocio, una tienda en la ofrece productos de la canasta familiar a sus vecinos de barrio. Su negocio tienda se ha convertido en una gran oportunidad para generar ingresos pues después de su separación se vio en la necesidad de trabajar como independiente. 

Actualmente necesita un préstamo para comprar mayor variedad de surtido y ofrecerle a sus clientes mayores opciones y así mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
From 7:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m., Gloria is in her store attending to neighborhood customers who come to shop for their families.  Her store has become a great opportunity for generating income, especially since her separation when she had to start working to support herself.

Now she is in need of a loan to buy a broader variety of inventory so she can offer her customers more options, thus increasing her income.

loans.use: To buy a variety products for the family shopping basket.

loans.name: Brenda Magaly

texts.es:
Brenda, de 28 años de edad, habita en la ciudad de Granada, esta casada, es madre de tres hijos, ella es comerciante, es dueña de una pulpería. Cuando empezó a vender fue con un canasta de dulces, caramelos y un termo con hielo que usaba  para vender gaseosas, jugos naturales , así fue  luchando poco a poco , hizo un préstamo para poder comprar mercadería y surtir su pulpería la cual hoy en día ya tiene un año de tenerla activada.    

Requiere el préstamo para surtir su pulpería de productos tales como arroz, frijoles azúcar, aceite, huevo, leche, productos de limpieza. Esto le será de mucho beneficio pues podrá satisfacer en parte la demande de producto de consumo diario y masivo, vender mas productos que antes no vendía y mejorar sus ingresos. En sus metas próxima esta ampliar más su pulpería, hacerle mejoras a su casa.
texts.en:
Brenda is 28 years old. She lives in the city of Granada. She is married and has 3 children. She is a storekeeper and owns a grocery store. She started out by selling candy from a basket and soft drinks and fruit juices from a thermos of ice. In this way she worked hard to move forwards a little bit at a time. She took out a loan to buy groceries to fill the grocery store she started a year ago. 

She is asking for the loan to fill her store with products such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, milk and cleaning products. This will be of great benefit as she will be able to satisfy in part the great demand for consumer products needed on a daily basis, sell more products not previously sold before and increase her income. Her next goals are to further expand her store and make improvements to her home.

loans.use: to buy inventory and fill her grocery store with products such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, eggs, milk and cleaning products.

loans.name: Laura Isabel

texts.es: Laura tiene 33 años, casada con Ítalo quien trabaja de albañil y tienen 4 hijos cada uno de 12, 9, 8, 3 años y son estudiantes en instituciones fiscales. Ellos viven en la zona suburbana del fortín (localidad de Guayaquil), Laura empezó hace 2 años en su negocio, a ella le gusta tener sus propios ingresos y además contribuir con los gastos del hogar. Inicia sus labores desde la 6h00 hasta las 21h00. La zona en la que vive tiene lomas y caminos de tierra por lo que se hace dificultoso salir a hacer alguna actividad fuera de casa. Con el préstamo que ella espera obtener está pensando comprar 100 cuadernos para venderlos en $1,50; 20 láminas educativas a costo $0.50  entre otra mercadería para comercializar, espera obtener una buena ganancia y seguir apoyando a  sus hijos  para que el futuro sean una excelentes profesionales.
texts.en:
Laura is 33 years old, and married to Italo who works as a bricklayer. They have 4 children, aged 12, 9, 8, and 3, who are students in tax-supported institutions. They live in the suburban zone of El Fortin (a locality in Guayaquil). Laura began her business 2 years ago. She likes to have her own  income and also to contribute to covering household expenses.

Laura works from 6:00 am until  9:00 pm.  The zone where she lives  is hilly and has dirt roads, which makes it difficult to carry out any activity outside the home.

With the loan she hope to obtain, Laura plans to buy 100 notebooks to sell at $1.50, and 20 laminated school sheets at $0.50, among other merchandise, to sell. Laura hopes to obtain good earnings and to continue helping her children so that in the future they may become excellent professionals.

loans.use: to buy notebooks and paper products to sell.

loans.name: Cristian

texts.es: Cristian, de 21 años es un joven muy trabajador, es soltero y vive en casa de sus abuelo quienes lo ciaron desde muy chico y le dieron educación, el vive junto a ellos y ayuda en los gastos de su hogar.El trabajo de Cristian consiste en salir muy temprano a la ciudad en busca de los pasajeros que buscan la manera de movilizarse de un lugar a otro, ya sea a su centro de trabajo o a su centro de estudios, el realiza esta actividad en las calles de la ciudad, lleva ya casi 7 años trabajando en este rubro, lo hace solo y empezó con la mototaxi de su tío y ahora tiene su propio vehiculo.Lo que le gusta es que dispone de su tiempo y gracias este trabajo pudo terminar su carrera de técnico en enfermería de un instituto nacional que hay en la ciudad, lo que no le gusta es que se tiene que quemar además de tener algunas molestias con sus riñones, espera poder sacar el titulo de su carrera para que así pueda empezar a trabajar en lo que el estudio.Este es el sexto préstamo entre Cristian y la institución, espera poder seguir trabajando así, hace mención que poder trabajar con un grupo así es bueno ya que todos muestran responsabilidad. Con el préstamo solicitado 2500 soles, espera poder comprar sus documentos para ponerse en regla con la autoridad policial, además de algunas piezas para su vehiculo.
texts.en:
Cristian is 21 years old and is a very hard-working young man.  He is single and lives in his grandparent's house.  They raised him from a young boy and gave him his education.  He also helps his grandparents with the household expenses.   Cristian's job consists of leaving very early in the morning and going to the city to look for passengers that need transportation from one place to another, either to their workplace or to school.   He does this on the streets of the city.  He has been working alone at this job for almost 7 years.  He started with his uncle's mototaxi [motorcycle taxi]  and now he has his own vehicle.   What he like most about this job is that he can make his own schedule which allows him to work on finishing his technical nursing degree at a national institute in the city.  What he doesn't like is that he gets burned out in addition to having kidney problems.   He hopes to earn his degree so that he can start working in the profession he has studied for.  

This is his sixth loan with the institution and he hopes to be able to continue working .  He would like to mention that working with a group has been good as all are very responsible.  With the loan of 2500 soles [Peruvian currency] he will purchase the documents he needs to be in good standing with the police as well as some parts for his car.

loans.use: purchase the documents he needs to be in good standing with the police as well as parts for his vehicle.

loans.name: Albeiro

texts.es:
Desde hace varios años Albeiro tiene un negocios de venta de oxidad rápidas, específicamente chuzo de carne, con este negocio el ha podido ayudar a su familia y sostenerse el mismo, además de poder mejorar cada día su calidad de vida.

El quiere tener un negocio en un local para brindarle a sus clientes un mejor espacio para atenderlos.
texts.en:
For several years Albeiro has been selling fast food, especially meat chuzo (shish-kabob).  This business has allowed him to support his family and himself, while improving their quality of life on a daily basis.

His goal is to open an establishment where he can offer his customers more space.

loans.use: To buy food ingredients.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana, D. 71 años, es casada co su esposo por muchos años, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo y un nieto a quien educo desD. muy pequeño.El trabajo D. Juana consiste en comprar al por mayor en el centro D. la ciudad, para luego vender al menudeo en su pequeña pero muy surtida tienda que tiene desD. hace dos años y que funciona en su casa para su mejor control y mator ganancia.Lo que le gusta D. su trabajo es que siempre hay clientes, lo que no le gusta es tener que decir no a las personas que a veces necesitan al crédito, opero los años D. experiencia le enseño que debe decir no en algún momento si no quiere salir perjudicada, espera mantener su negocio ya que no cree necesario poder agrandarlo ya que se abastece con lo que hace.Este es el préstamo numero 16 que realiza Juana con la institución MFP, le gusta el grupo que esta ya que todos son muy responsables, además agradece a la institución por la confianza brindada y espera poder seguir trabajando así por mucho tiempo mas ya que como dice ella, por mas que tenga edad avanzada tiene espíritu D. joven y ganas D. seguir trabajando.
Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, Juana comprará bebidas, y abarrotes para su tienda y así poder mantenerlo surtido.
texts.en:
Juana is 71, and has been married for many years. She has her own house, where she lives with her husband and grandson, who she has been raising since he was very small. Juana buys merchandise wholesale in the city center, and then later sells it at retail in her small, but very well-stocked store. 

She has had the store for two years, which she operates in her home, to better monitor it, and to have more profit.  What she likes about her work is that there are always customers; what she doesn't like is having to say no to people who sometimes need to buy on credit. But many years of experience has taught her that you have to say no at some point, if you don't want your business to be hurt. She hopes to keep her business going; she doesn't think it's necessary to expand it, since she is a able to proviD. for her needs with what she makes.

This is the 16th loan that Juana has maD. with the MFP institution. She likes the group she is in, as everyone is very responsible. As well she is grateful to the institution for the trust it has in her.  She hopes to be able to continue working in this way for a long time yet, since as she says, even though she is getting older, she has a young woman's spirit, and wants to keep working.  

With the amount she is applying for,1000 soles, Juana will buy drinks and groceries for her store, so as to keep it well-stocked.

loans.use: To buy drinks and groceries for her store, to keep it well-stocked.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a display case, refrigerator, and sugar.

loans.name: Nidya Auxiliadora

texts.es:
En una de las ciudades mas hermosas de Nicaragua llamada Ciudad de Granada , encontramos a Doña Nidya , de oficio costurera, madre de tres hijos, ella tiene 56 años de edad, esta casada lleva 20 años en este oficio de elaborar trajes para niños ya sean para bautizos , comuniones, también hace vestidos de boda y trajes para ejecutivos. Cuando ella inicio a cocer fue a los 20 años de edad, empezó a elaborar vestidos de niñas , luego con el paso de tiempo logro comprar 2 maquinas de cocer  con un préstamo que hizo, también compro materia prima para trabajar y  comenzar a elaborar ropa para niños que de hecho es en la línea que esta trabajando actualmente , hace diseños para vestuario de niños de buena calidad lo cual le ha permitido expandirse en el mercado de Granada, Masaya, Managua, Matagalpa, León, Chinandega ciudades en las cuales comercializa su producto. En este negocio le ayuda, su taller de costura lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación.  
Solicito el crédito para comprar materia prima como tela, hilos, agujas, botones, alfileres de costura, ya que desea aumentar el volumen de producción y necesita suficiente materia prima para trabajar. Esta pensando llevar su producto fuera del país y abrir mercado en Panamá y Guatemala que es donde quiere dar a conocer sus diseños.
texts.en:
We find Nidya in one of the most beautiful cities in Nicaragua, the city of Granada.  She is a seamstress, and she has three children.  She is 56 years old and married.  For 20 years she has been in this business of making children’s outfits for baptisms and communions, wedding clothes, and suits for executives.

She was 20 years old when she started sewing, and she started by making outfits for children.  Then, as time passed, she managed to buy two sewing machines with a loan that she got.  She also bought supplies for work and to start making children’s clothing.  Indeed, this is the line of work she is in now. 

She designs good quality children’s clothing, which has allowed her to expand in the markets in Granada, Masaya, Managua, Matagalpa, León, and Chinandega.  These are the cities where she sells her product.  In this business it helps that her seamstress shop is in her house.

She requested the loan to buy supplies like fabric, thread, needles, buttons, and pins.  She wants to increase the volume of production, and she needs to have enough supplies in order to work.

She is thinking of taking her product outside of the country and opening markets in Panama and Guatemala.  She wants her designs to be known in these countries.

loans.use: to buy supplies like fabric, thread, needles, buttons, and pins.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy second hand baby cloths to sell.

loans.name: Flavia Francisca

texts.es:
Flavia, originaria de la isla de Ometepe situada en el departamento de Granada, tiene 57 años de edad, es viuda, madre de 4 hijos, ella es comerciante se dedica a la venta de zapato. Flavia inicio vendiendo zapatos de  manera ambulante en los mercado de Granada , Masaya lo hacia con ayuda de su esposo ,luego solicitaron un préstamo con el fueron comprando mercadería para vender luego con el segundo crédito pudieron comprar un pequeño local en el mercado en el cual siguen trabajando hace 2 años que su esposo murió y ella dejo de vender en el mercado y solo siguió con la venta de zapatos la que en la actualidad sigue siendo su medio de trabajo el local en el mercado lo alquila de esta manera también obtiene otras ingresos. 
Requiere préstamo para comprar nuevo inventario de zapatos. Ella logro captar clientes que le ha estado solicitando mercadería de zapatos para abastecer su demanda, ella necesita mas inventario y esta inversión le permitirá cumplir con los pedidos que tiene, mejorar sus ingresos. Su próxima meta es establecer un local en la calle principal del comercio en Granada
texts.en:
Flavia is from the Island of Ometepe located in Granada Department.  She’s 57 years old and a widow.  She’s the mother of four children.  She’s a shoe merchant.  Flavia started out selling shoes as a street vendor in the markets in Granada and Masaya.  Her husband helped her.  Later, they took out a loan and bought merchandise to sell.  With the second loan they were able to buy a small stand in the market that they continued to use.  Two years ago when her husband died she stopped selling in the market and only kept the shoe sales which is still her source of work.  She rents out the stand in the market and this is a source of extra income.

She needs the loan to buy a new inventory of shoes.  She managed to obtain a clientele that has been requesting shoes and to meet customer demand she needs more stock inventory.  This investment will allow her to meet the pending orders she has and improve her income.  Her next goal is to set up a stand in Granada’s main commercial street.

loans.use: to buy new shoe inventory.

loans.name: Martha Verónica

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Amigas De Espoir se reúne cada quince días en la hermosa ciudad de Calceta, ciudad conocida con el nombre de “Calceta la sin par “por la belleza de sus mujeres y porque para sus habitantes no hay ciudad más hermosa en el mundo.

En este lugar vive la señora Martha, tiene 28 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 7 y 3 años el mayor estudia en escuela. El marido es médico. 

Nuestra amiga es una mujer que le gusta ser muy emprendedora y ganarse algo por su propia cuenta por lo cual se dedica al comercio, ella tiene un local donde vende  repuestos y refacciones de motocicletas, allí las personas que tienen este tipo de vehículos pueden encontrar lo que necesitan para tener en buen estado sus motocicletas, ella lleva tres años en este negocio le ha ido muy bien.

Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar llantas y repuestos eléctricos para motocicletas. Lleva tres años  en el Banco y le gusta ya que con los créditos ella puede solventar ciertos gastos urgentes.
 
Sus sueños son seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
The “Amigas de Espoir” Communal Bank meets each 15 days in the beautiful city of Calceta, a city known by the name of “Calceta the Unequaled” for the beauty of its women and because for its inhabitants, there is no city in the world more beautiful.

Martha lives here. She is 28 years old and maintains a common-law marriage from which 2 children have developed, aged 7 and 3. The older child studies in school. The husband is a doctor.

Martha is a woman who likes to be very enterprising and to earn something on her own account. For that reason, she is a merchant. She has a shop where she sells spares and replacement parts for motorcycles. Here people with these types of vehicles can find what they need to keep their motorcycles in good repair. Martha has been in this business for 3 years and it has gone well.

This new loan will be used to buy tires and electrical components for motorcycles. Martha has been a member of this bank for 3 years and she likes it, because with these loans she can take care of certain urgent costs.

Her dream is to keep her business growing.

loans.use: to buy tires and electrical parts for motorcycles.

loans.name: Leticia Candelaria

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Amigas De Espoir se reúne cada quince días en la hermosa ciudad de Calceta, ciudad conocida con el nombre de “Calceta la sin par” por la belleza de sus mujeres y porque para sus habitantes no hay ciudad más hermosa en el mundo.

En este lugar vive la señora Leticia, tiene 18 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un  hijo de un año y tres meses de nacido. El marido es controlador de autobús.
 
Nuestra amiga para ayudar a su marido con los gastos su bebe y del hogar se dedica al comercio, ella vende ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos. Trabaja todos los días pero sin un horario fijo, deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada fin de semana. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a  Santo Domingo cada vez que necesita. Tiene un año que se dedica a esta actividad y le va bastante bien.
 
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace tres ciclos y le gusta porque con el primer crédito empezó su negocio.
 
Sus sueños son tener un hogar estable.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Amigas de Espoir" meets every 15 days in the beautiful city of Calceta, a city known as "Peerless Calceta" because of the beauty of its women and because, for its residents, there isn't a more beautiful city in the world.

Here lives Leticia, 18, who is in a common-law marriage which has produced a child who is 1 year and three months old.  Her husband is a bus driver.

In order to help her husband with the expenses related to the baby and the home, Leticia has a business selling all types of clothing.  She sells door-to-door, and also sells from her house, where the customers who know her come to shop.  She works every day, but without a fixed schedule.  She sells on credit to her customers, and collects every weekend.  She goes to Santo Domingo to buy the merchandise every time she needs more.  She has had this business for a year now, and it is going quite well.

She will use this loan to buy more merchandise such as: pants, blouses, T-shirts and children's clothing.  She has been with her communal bank for 3 loan cycles, and she likes it because with the first loan she was able to start her business.

She dreams of having a stable home.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, T-shirts and children's clothing

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “IMASUMAC I”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Bertha; ella tiene 40 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de elaboración de productos lácteos como yogurt y también la socia trabaja como docente de nivel inicial y los productos lácteos lo vende en forma ambulatoria repartiendo a las diferentes tiendas y al público en general, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de elaboración de productos lácteos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para hacer los yogures como leche y azúcar.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "IMASUMAC I", which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Bertha is 40, has a common-law husband and two children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business making dairy products such as yogurt.  She also works as a beginning level teacher.  She sells the dairy products door to door and distributes them to different stores and the public in general.  She wants to expand her dairy products line and is requesting a loan to buy ingredients such as sugar and milk.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy ingredients to make yogurt, such as milk and sugar.

loans.name: Diana Karolina

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Amigas De Espoir se reúne cada quince días en la hermosa ciudad de Calceta, ciudad conocida con el nombre de “Calceta la sin par” por la belleza de sus mujeres y porque para sus habitantes no hay ciudad más hermosa en el mundo.

En este lugar vive la señora Diana, tiene 23 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 5 años y un bebe de 11 meses, el mayor estudian en escuela. El marido es comerciante.

Nuestra amiga junto a su marido se dedican al  comercio, ellos venden ropa de todo tipo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, nos cuenta que mientras su marido se desplaza a otros lugares ella también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes ya que como su bebe está muy pequeño se le hace difícil acompañar a su marido en sus recorridos pero que antes de nacer su hijo lo hacía con frecuencia. Ellos trabajan todos los días dejan a crédito y cobra cada fin de semana. Su mercadería compran en Quito y Guayaquil cada vez que necesitan. Llevan cinco años que se dedican a esta actividad y tienen muchos clientes.
 
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio  y le gusta porque los créditos son de gran ayuda para su negocio y su vida personal.

Sus sueños son tener un carro para realizar mejor sus ventas.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank "Amigas De Espoir" meets every two weeks in the beautiful city of Calceta.  The city is well-known, and has a nickname of "Calceta without equal" because of the beauty of its women, and because for its inhabitants, there is no more beautiful city in the entire world.

This is where Señora Diana lives.  She is 23 years old, and in a common law marriage from which she has a five-year-old child and and 11-month-old baby.  The older child attends school.  Her husband works in retail.

Our friend works in business together with her husband; they sell all types of clothing.  Their sales approach is to go door to door.  She tells us that her husband goes to other places, while she also works out of her home where her customers come to her.  This is also because her baby is still very young, so it's difficult for her to accompany her husband on his trips, although she used to do so regularly before her son was born.  They work everyday, selling on credit and making the charges each weekend.  They buy their merchandise in Quito and Guayaquil as they need it.  They have been working in this business for five years, and have many customers.

They will use this loan to buy more merchandise, such as: trousers, blouses, T-shirts, and children's clothing.

She has been a member of the Communal Bank since the beginning, and likes it because of the loans, which are a great help for her business and for her personal life.  Her dreams are to have a vehicle to use to improve her sales.

loans.use: to buy trousers, blouses, T-shirts and children's clothing.

loans.name: Ebenezer Group

texts.es: El señor Adrian tiene 40 años de edad, el es el tesorero de la alcancía comunal Ebenezer, esta alcancía tiene 7integrantes, todos son trabajadores responsables en cada uno de sus negocios. Adrian tiene su propio grupo musical que  se llama Instrumentos Musicales de Viento, el da presentaciones todos los fines de semana, con este trabajo ya tiene 15 años, y ha logrado con mucho esfuerzo darles lo mejor a sus dos hijos que ya se encuentran en la universidad, juntos con su conviviente tiene también el negocio de ventas de quenas y zampoñas, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a podido comprar su lote y construir su casa, con este ultimo préstamo piensa en comprar materiales y agrandar su negocio.
texts.en: Adrián, 40, is Treasurer of the “Ebenezer” communal bank.  This communal bank has seven members.  All are responsible workers in each of their businesses.  Adrián has a musical group called “Instrumentos Musicales de Viento” and he performs every weekend.  He’s been in this business for 15 years now.  Through much effort he’s managed to provide the best for his two children who are currently in university.  Together with his spouse he also has a business selling flutes and panpipes.  Thanks to his effort and dedication he’s been able to buy a lot and start to build his house.  He intends to use this last loan to buy building supplies and to enlarge his business.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “IMASUMAC I”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Lucila; ella tiene 24 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de fruta como platanos, manzanas, naranjas, uvas entre otras frutas, la socia vende en el mercado de Cusco, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de fruta. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar frutas como manzanas, plátanos, naranjas y uvas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Lucila is a member of the "IMASUMAC I" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Lucila is 24 years old, lives with her partner, and has one child.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling fruit such as bananas, apples, oranges, grapes, etc.  She sells her products in Cusco market from 6.00am to 7.00pm.  Through this business she gets her son ahead in life.  Lucila would like to expand and improve her fruit business.  She is requesting this loan to buy fruit such as apples, bananas, oranges and grapes wholesale.

Lucila is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy fruit such as apples, bananas, oranges and grapes wholesale

loans.name: Benigno

texts.es: El señor Benigno es un hombre trabajador y mantiene su espíritu emprendedor, trabaja como cerrajero y constructor de estructuras metálicas, lleva en el negocio por más de 10 años, vive con su conyugue e hijos, el señor benigno va a invertir el crédito otorgado en la construcción y ampliación de su casa; ya que falta techar una parte de ella. El Sr. Benigno tiene los sueños de tener una casa construida totalmente y para su negocio de tener una empresa de fabricación de estructuras metálicas a nivel nacional. El Sr. Benigno está muy agradecido con el crédito otorgado ya que gracias a el va a poder vivir dignamente en su propia casa.
texts.en:
Benigno is a hard-working man and he maintains his enterprising spirit by working as a locksmith and builder of metallic structures. For the past 10 years he has had his own business. He lives with his wife and children.

Benigno will invest the loan in rebuilding and expanding his house. A part of the house lacks roofing. Benigno dreams of having the house completed and of having an enterprise at the national level that builds metallic structures.

Benigno is very grateful for this loan because, thanks to it, he will be able to live with dignity in his own house.

loans.use: to rebuild and expand his house.

loans.name: Letty Narcisa

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Amigas De Espoir se reúne cada quince días en la hermosa ciudad de Calceta, ciudad conocida con el nombre de “Calceta la sin par” por la belleza de sus mujeres y porque para sus habitantes no hay ciudad más hermosa en el mundo.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Letty, tiene 45 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 4 hijos de 23, 19, 15 y 13 años de edad, los  dos mayores de edad estudian en Universidad y los menores en colegio. Su esposo es chofer. Nuestra amiga es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque el grupo ha crecido y es muy unido y solidario.

Es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos se dedica a la venta productos por catalogo de Avon y Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja todos los días ya que a veces sale a recorrer y también vende en su casa, además sus hijas le ayudan con las ventas ya que ellas venden en la universidad a sus compañeras de clases, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada dia sábado. Lleva cinco años que se dedica a esta actividad y le ha ido muy bien, nos cuenta que lo que más vende sin los perfumes ya que son muy buenos.

Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y bisutería.

Sus sueños son ver que todos sus hijos cumplan sus metas y sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
The “Amigas de Espoir” (Friends of Espoir) communal bank meets every two weeks in the beautiful city of Calceta, a city known as “Calceta la sin par” (Calceta the unequaled one) due to the beauty of its women and because for its residents there is no more beautiful city in the world.

We met Letty, 45, here.  She’s married and has four children who are 23, 19, 15 and 13 years of age.  The two oldest are studying at university and the two youngest are in secondary school.  Her husband’s a driver.  Our friend is a founding member of the communal bank and she likes it because the group has grown and is very united and mutually supportive.

She is a housewife who, in order to earn her own income, sells Avon and Yanbal (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumery and women’s accessories) via catalogue.  She works every day and sometimes goes out to sell as a street vendor and also door to door.  Her daughters help her sell since they sell to their classmates at the university.  She sells on credit and collects payments every Saturday.  She’s been in this line of work for five years and has done very well.  She tells us that what she sells the most is the perfumes because they are very good.

This loan is to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics and costume jewelry.  Her dreams are to see all her children reach their goals and be good professionals.

loans.use: to buy perfume, creams, cosmetics and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Los Girasoles Group

texts.es: La Sra. Roció  es conviviente, tiene 2 hijos en edad escolar, Roció tiene 33 años D. edad  actualmente es integrante en la alcancía comunal “Los Girasoles” grupo  conformado por 10  socios que se dedican a diversas actividades D. comercio. Roció   trabaja desD. hace 8  años en la venta D. comida es D. decir venD. menú (almuerzo y desayuno) en su domicilio  este negocio surge  por que sus hijos empezaron a ir al colegio y el sueldo D. su esposo no alcanzaba para cubrir los gastos básicos alimentación, educación y pagos D. servicio. Es así que trabajo muy duro para sacar  adelante a su familia, empezó vendiendo desayuno y con el tiempo tuvo mayor clientes  y después empezó a vender almuerzo Roció nos cuenta que su motivación eran sus hijos, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a logrado mejores ingresos económicos, sus hijos pudieron estudiar, poco apoco fue comprando cosas para su hogar y sobre todo su familia cuenta con una mejor calidad D. vida,  con el fin D. seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar mercadería(Arroz, Fideos) .Sabemos que Roció  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos D. Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Rocío is 33, is in a common-law relationship, and has two school-age children. Currently, she is a member of the "Los Girasoles" (Sunflowers) communal bank, which is maD. up of 10 members, who work in various retail businesses. 

Rocío has sold food for 8 years; that is to say meals (breakfasts and lunches), that she serves in her home.  She started the business because her children were starting high school, and her husband's salary wasn't enough to cover basic expenses, such as food, schooling, and service payments. This is how she worked very hard to help her family get ahead in life. 

She began selling breakfast and in time had more customers, and began to offer lunches. Rocío tells us that what motivated her were her children. Thanks to her efforts and dedication she has managed to increase her income, and her children were able to go to school.  Gradually, she began to buy things for the home, and above all, her family now has a better quality of life.  

With the aim of continuing to grow, she has applied for a new loan to buy ingredients (rice, noodles). We know that Rocío will achieve her goals, with a lot of work and effort, and that the loans from EDAPROSPO will help her.

loans.use: To buy rice and noodles for cooked meals.

loans.name: Blanca Encarnación

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Amigas De Espoir se reúne cada quince días en la hermosa ciudad de Calceta, ciudad conocida con el nombre de “Calceta la sin par” por la belleza de sus mujeres y porque para sus habitantes no hay ciudad más hermosa en el mundo.

La señora Blanca es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y fáciles de conseguir. Tiene 37 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 20, 18 y 11 años dos de ellos estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido es agricultor.
 
Nuestra amiga es una gran madre y esposa que para ayudar a su marido con los gastos del hogar también se dedica al  comercio, ella vende ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes cuando lleva mercadería nueva. Trabaja todos los días pero por horas y nos cuenta que cuando sale lo hace en las mañanas o en las noches ya que a estas horas es más fresco y encuentra a sus clientes, ella deja a crédito y cobra cada fin de semana. Su mercadería  la traen de Quito o de Guayaquil  cada vez que necesita. Tiene 4 años que se dedica a esta actividad y empezó con el primer crédito que recibió del banco. 

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños.
 
Sus sueños son seguir adelante.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank "Amigas De Espoir" meets every two weeks in the beautiful city of Calceta. The city is well-known, and has a nickname of "Calceta without equal" because of the beauty of its women, and because for its inhabitants, there is no more beautiful city in the entire world.

Señora Blanca is a founding member of the Communal Bank, which she likes because the loans are very quick and easy to obtain.  She is 37 years old and has a common-law marriage, from which she has three children aged 20, 18 and 11.  Two of her children are attending high school and primary school.  Her husband is a farmer.

Our friend is a great mother and wife, who also works in order to help her husband with the household expenses.  She sells clothes of every type, selling door-to-door, and also selling from her home, where her customers come when she has new merchandise.  She works for hours every day, and tells us that when she goes out to sell, she does so in the mornings or evenings, as this is when it is cooler and she can meet her customers.  She provides credit, and makes her charges each weekend.  She gets her merchandise from Quito or Guayaquil whenever necessary.  She has been working in this business for four years, and began it with the first loan that she received from the bank.

She is going to use this loan to buy more merchandise, such as: trousers, blouses, T-shirts, and children's clothing.

Her dreams are to continue moving ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy trousers, blouses, T-shirts and children's clothing.

loans.name: Benita

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “IMASUMAC I”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Benita; ella tiene 53 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de golosinas, ella vende caramelos, chicles, chupetes y galletas, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de golosinas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar golosinas como chupetes, caramelos y galletas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “IMASUMAC I” communal bank. The bank is located in the Cusco district of Cusco province and department.

Sra. Benita is 53 years old and single. She has a business where she sells sweets every day: candy, gum, lollipops and cookies. She works from 7 a.m. until 8 pm. With this business, she has helped her children get ahead. She wants to expand and improve her 
business selling sweets. She is requesting this loan in order to buy sweets, such as lollipops, candy and cookies, wholesale.

Sra. Benita is pleased about the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy sweets, such as lollipops, candy and cookies, wholesale.

loans.name: Jose Pablo

texts.es: José Pablo, tiene la edad 19 de años, está soltero y vive con sus padres y hermanos actualmente. El pretende con el crédito comprar insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal. El lo que va comprar específicamente es el abono y productos para aplicar al cultivo. El cuenta con el terreno establecido ya desde varios años atrás y con una plantación en condiciones buenas para la explotación de la misma. El pretende con el crédito realizar las ganancias económicas necesarias para seguir adelante con su proyecto  cafetalero  y generar ingresos económicos para el bienestar propio, la de sus hermanos y padres. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
José Pablo is 19, single and currently lives with his parents and siblings. With this loan, he intends to buy supplies to help with his coffee plantation. He will specifically buy fertilizer and other products to apply to his fields.

He is relying on land that was already planted in coffee several years ago and that is in good condition now for exploitation. He intends to use the loan to make the profits necessary to go ahead with his coffee plantation project and generate income for his own well being and that of his siblings and parents. 

This is José Pablo’s first loan with FUDECOSUR. He has not had other loans before from state banks, but FUDECOSUR more easily provided him with a loan and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to care for his coffee plantation.

loans.name: San Judas Tadeo Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Irma se inicio  en la venta D. cosméticos animada por sus amigas  y también por aportar algo adicional a sus ingresos  aparte D. eso también se dedica a la confección D. prendas D. lana e hilos, las que ofrece entre sus amistades y personas que aprecian su trabajo estos ingresos la ayudan  mucho para apoyar a sus hijos en los estudios, lo que ella mas quisiera es tener su propia tienda D. insumos para tejido  y ofrecer todo tipo D. productos para ese rubro, en esta oportunidad usara su préstamo para comprar  mas lanas y seguir tejiendo las prendas que confecciona aprovechando la demanda por la temporada D. invierno,  también con una parte cubrirá  el pago D. sus pedidos D. belleza para dar facilidades D. pago a sus clientas, el grupo SAN JUDAS TADEO esta formado por 8 socias  todas viven en la misma zona D. los olivos Lima Peru.

* La Sra.Irma es la primera esta con un bolso cruzado.
texts.en:
Señora Irma was inspired by her friends to start selling cosmetics, which also earns her some additional income.  In addition to this, she also works making garments from wool and yarn, which she sells among her friends and people who appreciate her work.  This income helps her greatly in supporting her children in their education.

What she most wants is to have her own store offering weaving supplies, and to offer every type of product for this field.

On this occasion, she will use her loan to buy more wool, and to continue weaving the clothes that she makes according to demand for the winter season.  With a small part, she will also cover the payment of her beauty orders, so as to proviD. payment facility for her customers.

The group SAN JUDAS TADEO is maD. up of eight members.  They all live in the same area of Los Olivos, in Lima, Peru.


* Señora Irma  is the first one in the photo with a bag across her chest.

loans.use: to buy wool and beauty products.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo, tiene la edad 60 de años, está casado y vive con su esposa y nieto. El pretende con el crédito comprar insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal. El lo que va comprar específicamente es el abono y productos para aplicar al cultivo y mejorar las cosechas de este año. El cuenta con el terreno establecido ya desde varios años atrás y con una plantación buena por lo cual quiere asistirla. El pretende con el crédito realizar la mayor cantidad de ganancias para salir adelante con el proyecto y darle a su familia una buena calidad de vida. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Gerardo is 60 years old and lives with his wife and grandchild. He intends to use this loan to buy supplies to improve his coffee fields. Specifically, he will buy manure and other products to apply to the crop and improve this years' harvests.

Gerardo can count on fields established various years ago and on a good stand of trees and he wants to improve them. He intends with this loan to obtain the largest earnings possible and to advance his plans and provide his family with a good quality of life. 

This is Gerardo's first loan through FUDECOSUR. He has not had previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR has approved his loan with all facilities and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: buy supplies to improve his coffee trees.

loans.name: Tommy Rene

texts.es: El Sr. Tommy tiene grandes deseos de superación y cuenta con su entusiasmo para lograrlo, el joven Tommy se dedica a prestar el servicio de taxi en una moto taxi alquilada, en la cual trabaja todos los días y tiene capacidad para ahorrar, el vive con sus padres, los cuales también trabajan para la prosperidad de su hogar, el señor Tommy va a invertir el crédito en la comprar de su propia moto ya que él alquila a  un amigo la moto taxi para trabajar, su gran sueño de Tommy es llegar a tener una casa propia y el sueño para su negocio es tener una empresa de transportes de moto taxi y autos. Tommy está muy agradecido por el crédito otorgado, ya que con el va poder surgir más rápido para lograr sus metas.
texts.en: Mr Tommy desperately wants to succeed and can count on his enthusiasm to do so. Tommy is a young man who runs a taxi service in a rented motorbike taxi. He works every day and is able to save. He lives with his parents who also work so that the home can prosper. Mr Tommy is going to use the loan to buy his own motorbike taxi as the one he currently uses is rented from a friend. Tommy's great dream is to own a house of his own and grow his business into a car and motorbike taxi company. Tommy is very grateful for the loan he has been granted as with it he can reach his goals sooner.

loans.use: to buy his own motorbike taxi.

loans.name: Fulgencia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “IMASUMAC I”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco. 

La socia es la Sra. Fulgencia; ella tiene 49 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, ella tiene un carro que hace servicio de taxi, su hijo trabaja con el carro y ella trabaja en una casa como empleada de hogar, por medio de este trabajo ella saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar el negocio de transporte y mejorar en su trabajo. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar repuestos para su carro.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank “IMASUMAC 1”.  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

This is Fulgencia; she is 49 years old, is cohabitating, and has 5 children.  She alternates her daily activities with her transport business.  She has a car that she uses for taxi service.  Her son works with the car and she works in a house as a maid.  With this work she moves her children forward.  She wants to improve her transport business and get better in her work.  She requests this loan to buy car parts.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make all her payments.

loans.use: to buy car parts.

loans.name: Natalia

texts.es:
Natalia es socia del  Banco Comunal “Vallecito Vizcachani”, ubicado en el distrito y departamento de Puno, tiene 62 años de edad, está casada y tiene 7 hijos, 6 de ellos son independientes.  Estudió hasta 3ro de educación primaria.
La señora trabaja desde hace cinco años con el Movimiento Manuela R., su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de comidas, nos cuenta que también se dedica a la venta de verduras.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/.   400.00 nuevo soles, comprará verduras como zanahoria, cebollas, zapallos, repollos, toda clase de verduras.  En el negocio le ayuda su hija, su esposo trabaja fuera de la ciudad, en San Juan del Oro. 
Su deseo es mejorar el negocio de comidas y poner una tienda de abarrotes.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo con periodos cortos y lo que gana el ahorro.
texts.en:
Natalia is a member of the “Vallecito Vizcachani” Communal Bank, which is located in the district and department of Puno.  She is 62 years old, and is married with seven children, six of whom are financially independent.  She studied up to the third level of primary education.

The Señora has been working with Movimiento Manuela R. for the last five years.  Her initial loan was for 300 New Soles, money which she invested in her business selling meals.  She tells us that she also works selling vegetables.

With this new loan of 400 New Soles, she will buy vegetables such as carrots, onions, pumpkins, cabbages, and all different kinds of vegetables.  Her daughter helps her with the business.  Her husband works away from the city, in San Juan del Oro.

Her wish is to grow her business selling meals, and to have a grocery store.  What she likes about the Communal Bank is the ease of the short-term loans, and that she can make savings.

loans.use: to buy vegetables such as carrots, onions, pumpkins, cabbages, and all different types of vegetables.

loans.name: Glendy Siomara

texts.es:
GLENDY  SIOMARA

Doña  GLENDY SIOMARA  quien desde hace varios años se dedica a la venta productos comestibles de consumo diario, ahora viendo la necesidad  de aprovechar los recursos de su  casa donde tiene su local, ahora ha  incluido la venta de pan, por la mañana y tarde, también agrego la venta de peluches  y regalos, como así mismo  los fines de semana se dedica a la venta de papas fritas,y pollo, entre otros  ella es una mujer muy trabajadora, y gracias a Dios cuenta con la ayuda en todo tiempo de su hija, quien atiende el negocio mientras ella vende refacciones de forma ambulante en su localidad,  tiene varias ideas en su mente que quiere  implementar pero para ello necesita de mas capital,  gracias a Dios los clientes la visita todos los días y su propósito es servirles y ofrecerles lo que ellos necesitan, es así como ella logra ayudar a su esposo en la crianza de sus 4 hijos ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles de primera nececidad.
texts.en:
Doña Glendy Siomara has been selling everyday consumer food products for several years. Now she sees the need to take advantage of the resources in her house where she has her store. She currently has added the sale of bread, both in the mornings and the afternoons. Glendy has also added plush toys and gifts to her inventory. On the weekends, she sells French fries, chicken, and other foods. She is an extremely hardworking woman.

Thanks to God, she has the full-time help of her daughter who manages the business while she sells snacks as a street vendor in town. Glendy has several ideas on her mind that she wants to implement, but she needs more capital. Thanks to God, her customers visit her every day. Her goal is to serve them and offer them what they need. In this manner, she is able to help her husband with raising their four children.

She is requesting a loan to buy food products that are basic staples.

loans.use: to buy food products for her store.

location.town: Aldea Cruz Blanca San Juan Sacatepequez

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es: Antonia tiene 25 años, está casado con Juan de 30 años, con quien tiene 2 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Pichari. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora, desde muy pequeña aprendió a labrar la tierra, pues fueron sus padres que le inculcaron esta actividad. Cuando se caso con Juan, decidieron juntos  comprar una parcela de cacao, de esa manera lograrían obtener ingresos económicos para el bienestar de su familia. Desde entonces se levanta muy temprano para trabajar sobre sus tierras, podando y sacando la maleza de sus plantaciones de cacao.  Antonia está muy contenta con esta labor que realiza, porque le genera buenas rentas, ya que por ser un producto de mayor demanda a nivel nacional e internacional. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en realizar el pago de sus cuotas muy puntualmente. Con los 1.000 soles que solicita, lo invertirá para contratar peones  y limpien su parcela de cacao.
texts.en: Antonia is 25 years old and married to Juan, 30.  They have two children.  They all live together in their own house located in Pichari District.  She is a very hardworking woman who learned how to till the soil while still a little girl because her parents taught her how to do so.  When she married Juan they decided together to buy a plot of cocoa beans to earn income for their family’s wellbeing.  Since then, she rises very early to work in her fields, pruning and weeding her cocoa bean crops.  Antonia is very happy with the work she carries out because it produces good profits because it’s a product in high demand both nationally and internationally.  This is her second MFP loan so she pledges to make her installment payments punctually.  She will use the 1000 soles requested to hire laborers to weed her cocoa bean field.

loans.use: to hire laborers.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es: Félix, tiene la edad 54 de años, está en casado y vive con su esposa y sus 3 hijos. El pretende con el crédito comprar insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal. El lo que va comprar específicamente es el abono y fungicidas necesarios para su asistencia. El cuenta con el terreno ya sembrado por lo cual quiere darle asistencia para así generar una buena cosecha este año. El pretende con el crédito realizar la mayor cantidad de ganancias para salir adelante con el proyecto y darle a su familia una buena calidad de vida en el futuro. También quiere obtener de su cafetal los mejores resultados y cumplir varos proyectos de vida. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Félix is 54 years of age, married and lives with his wife and three children.  With this loan he hopes to buy supplies to help with his coffee plantation.  Specifically he is going to buy the fertilizer and fungicides necessary to help his crop grow.  His fields have already been sewn and as such he wants to help them along so as to produce a good harvest this year.  

With the loan he hopes to make the highest possible profit in order to get ahead with the project and provide a good quality of life for his family in the future.  He also wants to get the best results from his coffee plantation and fulfill various life plans.  

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR.  He had not previously taken loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has given him a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to help grow his coffee

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es: Alexander, tiene la edad 24 de años, está en unión libre y vive con su esposa y su hijo. El pretende con el crédito comprar insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal. El lo que va comprar específicamente es el abono e insumos necesarios para su asistencia. El cuenta con el terreno ya sembrado por lo cual quiere darle asistencia para así obtener de este los  resultados esperados y altas cosechas. El pretende con el crédito realizar la mayor cantidad de ganancias para salir adelante con el proyecto y darle a su familia una buena calidad de vida en el futuro. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Alexander, 24, is in a common law relationship and lives with his wife and son.  He intends to use the loan to buy farming supplies for his coffee crops.  Specifically, he’ll buy manure and other supplies needed to support the crops.  He has a field already planted so he needs to provide assistance in order to obtain the desired results and high crop yields.  He intends for the loan to produce higher profits to get ahead with the project and provide his family with a good quality of life in the future.  This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR.  He’s had no previous loans with state banks and FUDECOSUR offered the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Maria Virginia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “IMASUMAC I”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra.  Maria Virginia; ella tiene 38 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de verduras como zapallos, zanahorias, pepinos, lechugas y tomates, ella vende en el mercado, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de verduras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar verduras como zanahorias, zapallos y pepinos al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “IMASUMAC I”. It is located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco

The member's name is Mrs Maria Virginia. She is 38 years old and has 5 children. The member divides her time between daily activities and her vegetable business. She sells squash, carrots, cucumbers, lettice, tomatoes and the like in the market. She works from 7:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m. The member wants to expand and improve her vegetable-selling business. She is asking for the loan in order to buy vegetables such as carrots, squash and cucumbers in bulk. 

The member is happy to be receiving the loan and agrees to make the repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: to buy vegetables such as carrots, squash and cucumbers in bulk.

loans.name: Santa Cecilia

texts.es:
Santa de 47 años es enfermera de profesión, un día un familiar la motivó a tener su propio negocio y poner en práctica sus conocimientos de medicina. Ella está casada con Welmar (Albañil) con quién tiene 3 hijos cada uno de 14, 12,9 años. Viven juntos en una zona periurbana denominada Balerio Estacio con caminos de tierra y mucha inseguridad.
Trabaja sola desde las 8:00 am hasta las 18:00 pm, dice que no se extiende demasiado en el horario ya que teme ser asaltada.
Está tramitando un préstamo el cual lo utilizará para comprar pastillas, jarabes, ampollas, todo por cajas. Sueña en el futuro tener una gran Distribuidora de Medicinas en el centro de la ciudad, para seguir dandoles el biesnestar que sus hijos se merecen concluye.
texts.en:
Santa, 47, is a nurse by profession.  One day a family member motivated her to have her own business and put her medical knowledge to use.  She’s married to Welmar (a bricklayer) and they have three children who are 14, 12 and 9 years of age.  They all live together in a periurban zone called Belisario Estacio that still has dirt roads and much insecurity.  She works alone from 8am until 6pm.  She says she doesn’t stay open any later because she fears being robbed.

She is negotiating a loan that she’ll use to buy pills, syrups, ampoules, all by the boxful.  She dreams in future to have a large medicine distributorship downtown to continue providing her children with the wellbeing they deserve, she concludes.

loans.use: to buy pills, syrup, ampoules and diapers.

loans.name: Corazon De Jesus Group

texts.es:
El grupo CORAZON D. JESUS  ya tiene formado cerca D. 1 año  este es su tercer desembolso y lo que mas agradecen a EDAPROSPO son sus prestamos que las ayudan a seguir progresando, cada una en su negocio particularmente L. Sra. Eusebia  siente que ha crecido mucho su negocio D. venta D. gas domestico va viento en popa  ya son 8 años que tiene en este rubro recuerda sus inicios cuando solo tenia 03 balones D. gas  las ventas eran mínimas  pero gracias a su persistencia salio adelante ahora tiene una distribuidora D. gas “BETHEL”  tiene un capital ganado que le permite tener buena solvencia y sobretodo  ayudar a sus hijos  en sus estudios para que sean buenos profesionales, L. Sra. Eusebia es L. secretaria del grupo en esta oportunidad elL. usara su préstamo para abastecerse D. gas para D. esa manera estar vigente ante L. demanda D. su clienteL..

* L. Sra. Eusebia esta con chompa marrón es L. 5ta D. las paradas.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Corazon D. Jesus" has been together for a year.  This is their third loan, and what they most appreciate about EDAPROSPO has been the access to loans that have helped them to continue to make progress.  Each one of them has a business.  Eusebia feels that her business selling domestic gas has grown a lot.  It is now booming, but she remembers that when she started in this line of work 8 years ago she had only 3 gas tanks and her sales were minimal.  But thanks to her persistence, she has managed to get ahead and now she is a "BETHEL" gas distributor.  She has had capital gains that have allowed her to have good solvency and, most importantly, to help her children in their studies so that they can become good professionals.  Eusebia is the secretary of the communal bank, and at this time she will use her loan to stock up on gas so that she will be able to meet the demands of her customers.

Eusebia is in the brown sweater, and is the fifth standing person from the left.

loans.use: to buy domestic gas

loans.name: Maria Antonieta

texts.es: La Sra. María es una mujer luchadora, trabajadora y  con muchos deseos de superación y éxito; ella vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos; la Sra. María se dedica a la venta de ropa para bebes y niños, ya lleva en el negocio más de 2 años laborando; por medio de los ingresos de su esposo puso el negocio y se dedico a ello ya que le encantan los bebes, gana aproximadamente S/. 180 nuevos soles semanales. El crédito otorgado lo va a invertir en la compra de mas mercadería (ropa para bebes y niños) ya que quiere tener bastante variedad de modelos.   Sus sueños de la Sra. María es poder aperturar una tienda reconocida y darles una buena calidad de vida a sus hijos para que no les falte nada. Ella está muy agradecida por el crédito otorgado ya que con ello va a tener mayor éxito en sus ventas.
texts.en:
María is a fighter and an industrious woman with many hopes for getting ahead and for her success. She lives with her husband and her three children. María sells baby and children's clothing. She has been working in the business for more than two years. 

She started the business with her husband’s income and she is committed to it because of her love for babies. She earns approximately 180 nuevos soles weekly. She is going to invest the loan in the purchase of more merchandise (baby and children's clothing) because she wants to have a wider selection of styles. 

María’s dream is to have well known store and to provide a good future for her children so they don’t need anything. She is very grateful for the loan because it will provide her with greater success in her sales.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise (baby and children's clothing) to increase her sales.

loans.name: Mery Salome

texts.es:
Mery es socia del  Banco Comunal “Vallecito Vizcachani”, ubicado en el distrito y departamento de Puno, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada y tiene 5 hijos, uno de ellos es independiente.  Cuenta con educación primaria.
Su primer préstamo de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles lo invirtió en su negocio de venta de verduras y flores, trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace ocho años.
Con este nuevo préstamo  de  S/.  100.00 nuevo soles, invertirá en la compra de semillas de zanahoria, cebolla y flores, etc,  para el sembrío,  para luego venderlos.  Trabaja sola en el negocia su esposo trabaja en construcción civil.
La señora desea tener un puesto en el mercado y que su  negocio crezca.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal  es la facilidad del préstamo en períodos cortos
texts.en:
Mery’s a member of the “Vallecito Vizcachani” (Little Vizcachani Valley) communal bank located in Puno District and Department.  She’s 42 years old, married and has five children; one of them is independent.  She finished elementary school.

Her first loan was for 300 new soles and she invested it in her vegetable and flower sales business.  He’s been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for the last 8 years.

She will use this new, 100 new sol loan, to buy carrot seeds, onions and flowers, etc. to grow and then sell.  She works alone in her business; her husband works in civil construction.  She hopes to have a stand in the market and that her business grows.  What she likes about the communal bank is the ease of short-term loans.

loans.use: to buy carrot seeds, onions and flowers, etc.

loans.name: Julia Ludgarda

texts.es:
Julia es socia del  Banco Comunal “Vallecito Vizcachani”, ubicado en el distrito D. Puno, provincia y departamento D. Puno, tiene 53 años D. edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos, 3 D. ellos son independientes.  Cuenta con educación primaria.
Su primer préstamo D. S/. 300.00 nuevo soles lo invirtió en su negocio venta D. verduras como zanahoria, repollo, etc.  DesD. hace un ciclo trabaja  con el Movimiento Manuela R..
Con éste un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, comprará un camión D. guano para el sembrío D. verduras como repollo, hortalizas, etc.  La socia nos cuenta que trabaja sola  en el negocio,  su esposo trabaja como profesor.
Su deseo es tener una tienda D. abarrotes y así mejorar sus ingresos.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal  es la facilidad del préstamo, la puntualidad y la responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Julia is a member of the "Vallecito Vizcachani" communal bank, located in Puno district, in the province and department of Puno.  She is 53, married with 4 children, 3 of whom are living on their own.  She has a primary school education.  

She used her her first loan of 300 nuevo soles for her business of selling vegetables, such as carrots, cabbages etc.  She has been working for one loan cycle with Movimiento Manuela R..  She will use this new loan of 300 nuevo soles to buy a truckload of guano manure for growing cabbages and other vegetables.  

She tells us that she works on her own in the business, as her husband is a teacher.  Her wish is to have a grocery store, and in this way improve her income. What she likes about the communal bank are the easy terms, paying on time and the responsibility.

loans.use: To buy a truckload of guano manure to grow vegetables.

loans.name: Noe

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “IMASUMAC I”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Noe; el tiene 44 años de edad y es casado y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, el hace servicio de taxi trabajando desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere mejorar el negocio de servicio de taxi. El  socio solicita el préstamo para mantenimiento de su carro para comprar llantas.
                                         
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Señor Noe is a member of the communal bank "Imasumac I" located in the district, province and department of Cusco.  He is 44 years old, married and has 2 children.  He alternates his daily activities with his transportation business.  He runs a  taxi service from 5:00 am until 8:00 pm.  Through this business he has been able to provide for his children.  He wants to improve his taxi business.  He is requesting a loan to maintain his car and buy tires.  

He is happy about the loan and is committed to making his payments on time.

loans.use: maintain his car and buy tires.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “FUENTE DE VIDA” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.
