La  socia Angelica; tiene 45 años de edad,  la socia es casada; la socia tiene 5 hijos de los cuales solo dos de ellos están bajo la responsabilidad de la socia;  ella se dedica  a la elaboración de comidas, la socia vende de manera independiente sus diferentes potajes hechos por ella misma, la socia ama la cocina su sueño es poner un restaurante propio, pero ella sabe que esto es muy costoso por esta razón la socia se mantiene de forma independiente, la socia desea el crédito para invertir en la compra de insumos como aceite al por mayor, papas, arroz en bolsa de 30 kilos, sal en sobres y de esta manera en otros ingredientes y productos más. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de comidas caseras.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Angelica is a member of the communal bank "Fuente de Vida" located in the district of Huanchac in the province and department of Cusco.  She is 45 years old, married and has 5 children, two of whom are still dependent.  She makes food for a living.  She sells the different Peruvian dishes she makes in an independent manner.  She loves to cook.   Her dream is to open her own restaurant but she knows that this is very costly and for this reason she continues to sell independently.  

She is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as wholesale oil, potatoes, rice in 30 kilo bags, salt in packets, and other ingredients and products to make her homemade foods.  She is grateful for the support given to her and is committed to making her payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: purchase supplies to make her homemade foods.

loans.name: Fanny Patricia

texts.es:
Fanny es socia del  Banco Comunal  “Vallecito Vizcachani”, ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y  departamento de Puno, tiene 26 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo.  Ella cuenta con educación superior.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela R. desde hace un ciclo, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/.  300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de productos de la Región como habas, chuño, cebada, quinua, etc.
Con éste nuevo crédito por la suma de S/.  300.00 nuevo soles, incrementará al capital de su negocio y comprará cinco arrobas de quinua, chuño, habas. En el negocio trabaja junto con su suegra, su esposo trabaja en una orquesta y es músico.
La señora desea prosperar en el negocio, por ello está trabajando mucho.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo, el ahorro y sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Fanny’s a member of the “Vallecito Vizcachani” (Little Vizcachani Valley) communal bank located in Puno District, Puno Province and Department.  She’s 26 years old, has a spouse and a son.  She completed high school.

She’s worked with the Manuela R. Movement for one cycle.  Her first loan was for 300 new soles that she invested in her business selling regional products like lima beans, dehydrated potato, barley, quinoa, etc.

She will use this new, 300 new sol, loan to increase working capital buying five arrobas (1 arroba=25lbs. approx.) of quinoa, dehydrated potato and lima beans.  She works with her mother-in-law in this business; her husband is a musician and works in an orchestra.

She hopes to prosper in business and this is why she is working so much.  What she likes about the communal bank is the ease of the loan, the savings and her profits.

loans.use: to buy five arrobas of quinoa, dehydrated potatoes and lima beans.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “FRATERNIDAD DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maria del Carmen; ella tiene 48 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos secos como papa, trigo, cebada y quinua, la socia vende en el mercado de Urubamba desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de granos secos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cebada, trigo, quinua y papa al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “FRATERNIDAD DE URUBAMBA” communal bank. The bank is located in Urubamba district, part of Urubamba province and Cusco department.

Sra. Maria del Carmen is 48, married and has 4 children. She sells dry staples such as potatoes, wheat, barley and quinoa in the market in Urubamba and works from 6 a.m. to 5 p.m. Her business has enabled her to help her children get ahead. She wants to expand her business selling dry grains and is requesting this loan to buy barley, wheat, guinoa and potatoes wholesale.

Sra. Maria del Carmen is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy barley, wheat, guinoa and potatoes wholesale.

loans.name: La Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es: Lida es una mujer de 25 años de edad, ella pertenece al grupo La nueva esperanza tiene  8 integrantes, este grupo tiene formado 2 años y es caracterizado por ser mujeres empeñosas y responsables con sus familias. Lida a su corta edad es vendedora de productos de belleza y organizadora de eventos (festejos, agasajos) con las ventas de productos de belleza ya tiene 5 años y se está preparándose para ser capacitadora. En la organización de eventos ella y su conviviente comparte el trabajo, gracias a sus ingresos como la de su conviviente, pueden darles educación y alimentos a sus dos hijos, y también pagar la construcción de su vivienda, ella está muy orgullosa de sus logros, con este préstamo piensa comprar material de sonidos y terminar con la construcción de su casa.
texts.en:
Lida is a 25-year old woman who belongs to the group La Nueva Esperanza. The group was formed 2 years ago and has 8 members who are characterized as persevering women and responsible with their families. 

At her young age Lida sells beauty products and organizes events (parties, celebrations). She has been selling beauty products for 5 years now and she is working to be a trainer. She and her partner share the event planning work. 

Thanks to her income, along with her partner's, they can provide education and food for their two children and pay for the construction of their home. She is very proud of her achievements, and with this loan she plans to purchase a sound system and finish the construction of their house.

loans.use: to purchase a sound system.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana de 39 años de edad, casada con Andrés de 43 años con quien tiene 1 hijo. Ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el distrito de Pichari.Desde hace varios años atrás, Ana viene dedicándose al negocio de venta de abarrotes en general.  Fue simplemente porque en su barrio no existía una tienda así, y sin pensarlo dos veces lo puso en marcha. Desde luego que viene obteniendo buenas ganancias económicas con respecto a los años anteriores. Generalmente su horario de mayor venta es a partir de las 5:00 de la mañana hasta las 8: 00 de la mañana, ya que recibe una cantidad considerable de clientes, en donde sus hijos los facilita en atender a sus clientes de manera rápida. Normalmente los producto que Ella expende, son de primera necesidad para el hogar, es por ello que se siente contenta y satisfecha por lo que viene realizando; su punto de venta lo realiza en el primer piso de su propia casa, a un precio módico. Sus planes a futuro es la de incrementar mas productos y surtirlas con la finalidad de obtener mejores ingresos económicos para el bienestar de su familia.Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que ella se compromete una vez más en realizar puntualmente  el pago de sus cuotas.Con los 1.000 nuevos soles desea incrementar más productos.Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que ella se compromete una vez más en realizar puntualmente  el pago de sus cuotas.Ana es tan responsable en su banco comunal tal igual que sus compañeros de su banco comunal.Con los 1.000 nuevos soles desea comprar más productos para su tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en: Ana, 39, is married to Andres, 43, and they have one child.  They live in their own home located in the Pichari district.  For a number of years, Ana has been selling groceries.  In her neighborhood there was no grocery store, so without thinking about it twice she decided to start up her own store.  Ever since, she has been getting better earnings each year.  Usually her best selling hours are from 5am until 8am, since during this time she receives a large quantity of customers; during these hours her children help her to attend to her customers quickly.  Normally the products that she sells are staples for the home, and because of this she feels content and satisfied with the work that she is doing.  She makes her sales from the first floor of her own house, at a reasonable price.  In the future, she plans to stock her store with a greater number of products with the goal of increasing her income, so that she can provide for her family's well-being.  This is her second loan with MFP, and so she is committed once again to making all of her payments on time.  With the 1,000 Peruvian soles, she wants to buy more products for her store.  Ana is very responsible in her communal bank, as well as with the members of her bank.  With the 1,000 Peruvian soles requested she wants to buy more products for her grocery store.

loans.use: to buy more products for her grocery store

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “FRATERNIDAD DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Victoria; ella tiene 49 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de maíz y productos secos como trigo, quinua y cebada, ella tiene un puesto en el mercado de Urubamba donde atiende desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar el negocio de venta de maíz y granos secos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar maíz, trigo y quinua al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Victoria belongs to the Fraternidad de Urubamba Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.  

Victoria, age 49, is married and has four children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business of selling corn and dried products like wheat, quinoa, and barley.  She has a stand at the Urubamba market, and she works there from 5:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  

It is through this business that she gets her children ahead.  She wants to improve her business of selling corn and dried grains.  

She is requesting the loan to buy wholesale corn, wheat, and quinoa.  She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make all of her payments

loans.use: to buy wholesale corn, wheat, and quinoa.

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “FRATERNIDAD DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Juan Alberto; el tiene 50 años de edad y es casado y tiene 6 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de carpintería, el hace trabajos como sillas,mesas,camas y puertas, también el socio se dedica a la agricultura, el tiene un terreno donde siembra maíz y papa y luego lo vende al por mayor en el mercado de Urubamba y el negocio de carpintería lo realiza a pedidos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de carpintería y mejorar sus tierras de cultivo. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar madera y también para comprar semillas y fertilizante para su tierra de cultivo. 
                                        
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Juan Alberto belongs to the Fraternidad de Urubamba Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.  Juan Alberto, age 50, is married and has six children.  

He alternates his daily activities with his carpentry business. He works on things like chairs, tables, beds, and doors.  He is also a farmer.  He has land where he grows corn and potatoes.  He later sells them wholesale at the Urubamba market.  He conducts his carpentry business by orders.

He wants to expand his carpentry business and improve his fields.  He is requesting the loan to buy wood and to also buy seeds and fertilizers for his fields.

He is happy about the loan, and he pledges to make all of his payments

loans.use: to buy wood and to also buy seeds and fertilizers for his fields.

loans.name: Brigida

texts.es: Brígida tiene 54 años, está casada con Jesús de 56 años, con quien tiene 2 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Pichari. Hace más de 7 años que se dedica a la actividad agrícola, y lo realiza con mucho esfuerzo  y perseverancia, pues de ello depende para ganar dinero y poder darles a sus hijos una buena educación, alimentación y estabilidad. Si bien al comienzo ella solo contaba con una pequeña parcela de cultivo de cacao, pero con el tiempo logró estabilizarse económicamente, eso le favoreció en la compra de otro terreno más. Pero en este trabajo no está sola, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo e hijos, pero a la vez tiene a su cargo peones que lo puedan facilitar en el cultivo de su producto de cacao. Usualmente ella los vende a los comerciantes mayoristas o en los Centros de Acopio de su comunidad. En el futuro piensa expandirse adquiriendo nuevos terrenos para cultivar nuevos productos que tengan mayor demanda en el mercado nacional como el palillo, el Mani. Este  es su primer crédito con MFP, por el que se compromete a efectivizar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1.000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en el buen manejo agronómico de su terreno, contratando peones para que lo fertilicen y poden su parcela.
texts.en:
Brígida is 54 years old, married to Jesús, 56, and has two children.  They live together in their own house located in Pichari District.  She’s been farming for over 7 years, something she does with much effort and perseverance because earning money to provide her children with education, food and stability depends on it.  

At the beginning she only had a small parcel of land to grow cocoa beans but in time she managed to stabilize economically and she was able to buy another piece of land.  She’s not alone in her work, though.  Her husband and children help her but she also has laborers that can make the cocoa bean farming a little easier.  She usually sells it to wholesalers or to her community’s crop gathering centers.  In the future, she plans to expand acquiring new land to grow new products that are in high demand in the national market like palillo (guava-like fruit) and peanuts.

This is her first MFP loan so she commits to pay her installments punctually.  She will use the 1000 new soles to hire laborers to fertilize and prune her plants to provide her land with good maintenance.

loans.use: to hire laborers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy uniforms and school supplies.

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “FUENTE DE VIDA” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Rocio; tiene 23 años de edad,  la socia es conviviente; la socia tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 3 años de edad; la socia esta dentro del rubro de comerciantes minorista, la socia compra y vende ropa ella trae de la ciudad de Puno específicamente de Juliaca al por mayor de las fabricas y los vende de forma independiente a sus clientes y amistades. La socia tiene sus contactos y desea seguir creciendo para dar mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de ropa ella también viajara con ese dinero.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Rocio belongs to the “Fuente de Vida” (Fountain of Life) Communal Bank.  It is located in the Huanchac district, Cusco province, Custo department.  Rocio is 23 years old, and she is in a common-law marriage.  She has two children, ages five and three.

She is a retail merchant.  She buys and sells clothes that she gets wholesale from factories in the city of Puno, specifically from Juliaca.  She sells the clothes in an independent manner to her customers and friends.  She has her contacts, and she wants to continue growing in order to give her children a better quality of life.

She is requesting the loan to buy clothes.  She will also use this money to travel.

She is grateful for the support that she will receive, and she pledges to make her payments in a disciplined way.

loans.use: to buy clothes and to travel.

loans.name: Luis Aurelio

texts.es: EL Sr. Luis es un hombre luchador y con muchas aspiraciones de salir adelante y por ello ha dedicado parte de su vida a trabajar constantemente y poco a poco ha sabido ganarse la admiración de toda su familia; él se dedica a la construcción es operario de albañil, tiene 15 años laborando; empezó como obrero y poco a poco fue escalando y ahora es operador de albañil, gana aproximadamente S/. 360 soles semanales. El crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de porcinos para la crianza ya que dicho negocio es rentable. Sus sueños y metas es poder implementar su negocio de chanchería y formar su propia crianza y ser reconocido. El Sr. Luis está muy agradecido por el  crédito otorgado ya que con ello va lograr mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is a determined man who is always looking to get ahead. That's why he spends part of his life working incessantly, and little by little he has won the admiration of his entire family. He has worked in construction as a bricklayer for 15 years; he started as a laborer and worked his way up, little by little, to a skilled bricklaying position. He earns approximately 360 Nuevos Soles per week. 

He is going to invest the loan into the purchase of pigs that he can raise, since that is a profitable business. His dream and goal is to start a pig raising business, form his own husbandry endeavor and gain recognition. Luis is very grateful for the loan offering because it will allow him to increase his family's income.

loans.use: to buy pigs to raise.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “FRATERNIDAD DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Marco Antonio; el tiene 36 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo como seguridad en un hotel y también tiene una tienda de abarrotes donde su esposa atiende, el socio trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 7.00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo y de su pequeño negocio que es la tienda de abarrotes el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y mejorar en su trabajo como seguridad. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar productos de tienda de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, aceite y leche al por mayor. 
                                       
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the“FRATERNIDAD DE URUBAMBA” communal bank. The bank is located in Urubamba district, part of Urubamba province in Cusco department

Sr. Marco Antonio is 36, lives with his partner and has 1 son.  He has a job as a security guard in a hotel and he also has a grocery store which his wife runs. He works from 6 a.m. to 7 p.m.

By means of his job and his small business, he is helping his son get ahead. He wants to expand his grocery store business and improve in his work as a security guard. He is requesting the loan to buy products for his grocery store, such as rice, sugar, oil and milk, wholesale.

He is happy about the loan and is committed to making his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy products for his grocery store, such as rice, sugar, oil and milk, wholesale.

loans.name: Indelecio

texts.es: Indelecio de 59 años de edad, casado con Zenayda  de 50 años, con quien tiene 6 hijos, juntos habitan en su casa propia, ubicada en el distrito de Pichari. Apenas estudió la primaria, pero eso no lo impidió a seguir soñando, pues deseaba tener su propio campo agrícola. Pero gracias a su perseverancia y esfuerzo logró establecerse en la agrñicultura pero de manera natural orgánica sin el uso de químicos. Desde entonces práctica técnicas agrícolas que no dañan el medio ambiente. Estos conocimientos los está transfiriendo a sus hijos para que sigan su ejemplo y a la vez enseñar a conservar el medio ambiente. Su producto es reconocido en su comunidad, por la buena calidad que tiene consigo, es por ello que los grandes mayoristas llegan a su parcela para comprar su producción a un precio competitivo, por tanto recibe buenas ganancias. Usualmente ella trabaja con su pareja, pero en ocasiones recibe la ayuda de sus hijos, pero en temporada de cosecha necesita de peones para que lo facilite la extracción de sus productos. En un futuro desea incrementar su campo agrícola, con la necesidad de ganar clientes potenciales. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en pagar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2,000 soles que solicita, contratará peones para que le ayuden en la limpieza de su parcela sacando la maleza que crece.
texts.en:
Indelecio is 59, and is married to Zenayda who is 50.  They have 6 children, and live together in their own house, located in the district of Pichari. He barely finished primary school, but this didn't prevent him from continuing to dream, as he wanted to have his own farm. 

Thanks to his perseverance and effort, he managed to set himself up in agriculture. He uses natural organic methods without the use of chemicals. Since then he has practiced farming techniques that don't damage the environment. He's passing his knowledge on to his children so that they follow his example and at the same time he is teaching them to preserve the environment. 

His products are well-known in the community for their quality. That's why the big wholesalers come to his land to buy his production at a competitive price; so he makes good profits. Usually his wife works with him, but sometimes his sons help.  During the harvest season he needs workers to assist with this. In the future, he wishes to add to his farm, as he needs to win more customers.  

This is his second loan with MFP, so he is committed to making his instalment payments on time.  With the 2,000 soles that he is applying for, he will hire workers to help him clear his land by removing weeds.

loans.use: To hire workers to remove weeds, and help with the harvest.

loans.name: Viviana

texts.es: Viviana es socia del Banco Comunal Inti, tiene 37 años y 4 hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de Carbón de ladrillo, gallinas y papa en la Selva. Viviana es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 3 años, el préstamo que ha solicitado lo invertirá en su negocio ya que es la Fiesta de Santa Rosa y hay mayor demanda. Agradece los préstamos recibidos, lo mas importante para ella son sus hijos, les ha podido educar en buenos colegios y tiene la satisfacción de que el mayor ya ingresó a la Universidad San Cristóbal de Huamanga, le gusta las reuniones de su Banco Comunal porque le enseñan a ahorrar y a poder invertir bien en su negocio, ahora su meta es poder comprar un carro.
texts.en:
Viviana is a member of the “Inti” communal bank.  She’s 37 years old and has four children.  She sells charcoal briquettes, chickens and potatoes in the jungle.  Viviana has been a member of FINCA Perú for the last three years.  The loan she’s requesting will be invested in her business because the feast day of Saint Rose is approaching and demand rises.

She gives thanks for the loans received.  Her children are the most important thing to her.  She’s managed to educate them in good schools and she has the satisfaction that her eldest has enrolled in the San Cristóbal University in Huamanga.

She likes the communal bank meetings because they teach her how to save and to invest well in her business.  Now, her goal is to buy a car.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “FUENTE DE VIDA” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia María; tiene 32 años de edad,  la socia es soltera y tiene 4 hijos de 14, 10, 9, 5 años de edad: la socia compra y vende productos ardiss los cuales compra de las mismas tiendas de venta permitida y los entrega a sus respectivos clientes, la socia vende estos productos naturales  para la salud y también se dedica  a la venta de  prendas de vestir, la socia desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de productos y ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en sus negocios ella comprara productos de salud natural y prendas de vestir para damas, a caballeros y niños los cuales los vende de forma independiente a sus amistades.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Fuente de Vida" communal bank. The bank is located in the Huanchac district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Maria is 32, single, and has 4 children ages 14, 10, 9 and 5. She buys and sells Ardiss products from authorized distributors and provides them to her customers. She sells these natural health products and also sells clothing. She wants to invest this loan in the purchase of products and clothing. She is requesting this loan to invest in her businesses. She will purchase natural health products and items of clothing for women, men and children, which she sells independently to her friends.

She is grateful for the support that you are offering and promises to repay her quotas in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in her businesses. She will purchase natural health products and items of clothing for women, men and children to sell independently to her friends.

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “FRATERNIDAD DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Leonarda; ella tiene 41 años de edad y es casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de paja y también tiene una tienda de abarrotes donde vende arroz,azúcar,cerveza,gaseosa y chicha que es una bebida a base de maíz, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de productos, chicha y paja. La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar y comprar paja, arroz, azúcar y gaseosas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “FRATERNIDAD DE URUBAMBA” communal bank. The bank is located in the Urubamba district, belonging to the province of Urubamba, Cusco department.

The member is Sra. Leonarda. She is 41, married, and has 5 children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her straw sales business, and she also has a grocery store where she sells rice, sugar, beer, pop and chicha (a corn-based drink). She works from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm. Through this business, she gets her children ahead. She wants to expand and improve her business selling products, chicha and straw. She is requesting this loan to purchase straw, rice, sugar and pop wholesale.

She is happy to have this loan and promises to repay her quotas.

loans.use: to stock and purchase straw, rice, sugar and pop wholesale.

loans.name: Roy Gabriel

texts.es:
Roy es un señor de 30 años de edad, el cual vive con su esposa e hijos, en  la Fuente, en la provincia de Cartago. El principal sistema de drenaje de esta zona es el río Reventazón que nace en el Cerro Cuericí. Por la fertilidad de sus suelos volcánicos y aluviales, Cartago es el centro de población que tiene en la agricultura y ganadería sus principales fuentes económicas.

Desde hace varios años que Roy tiene este negocio del ganado lechero, ya que cuenta en estos momentos con el propiedad que le heredaron sus padres, pero le falta lo principal para que su negocio surja y para que los vecinos de su comunidad se vean beneficiados.  El proyecto le es muy interesante.

Actualmente Roy está solicitando un micro crédito de ¢500.000 (quinientos mil colones) para la compra de materiales de construcción para su lechería. Con esto el espera hacer crecer su negocio, ya que su meta es tener un mejor lugar de trabajo donde se pueda instalar bien con sus animales y mejorar tanto su calidad de vida como la de su familia. 

Roy es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Delirio, una de las 110 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Este será su primer préstamo y con él espera continuar creciendo a nivel personal y económico además de participar activamente en la organización de crédito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Roy is a 30-year-old man who lives with his wife and children in La Fuente, Cartago province. The main drainage system in this zone is the Reventazón River, which stems from the Cerro Cuericí. Due to the fertility of its volcanic and alluvial soil, Cartago is the population center whose main economic sources are agriculture and ranching.

Roy has had this dairy business for several years, and he now has property which he inherited from his parents. However, he does not have the necesary capital to build up his business and for the neighbours in his community to benefit. This project is very interesting for him.

Roy is now requesting a micro loan of ¢500.000 (five hundred thousand colons) for the purchase of construction materials for his dairy. In doing so, he hopes to expand his business, as his goal is to have a better place to work where he can settle down with his animals and improve his quality of life and that of his family.

Roy is a member of the Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Delirio, one of the 110 member organizations of EDESA in Costa Rica. This will be his first loan, and with it he hopes to continue growing on a personal and economic level, as well as participating actively in his community's credit organization.

loans.use: to build a dairy

loans.name: Alberth Uriel

texts.es:
Alberth es un señor de 41 años de edad, el cual vive con su esposa e hijos, en  la Fuente, en la provincia de Cartago. El principal sistema de drenaje de esta zona es el río Reventazón que nace en el Cerro Cuericí. Por la fertilidad de sus suelos volcánicos y aluviales, Cartago es el centro de población que tiene en la agricultura y ganadería sus principales fuentes económicas.

Desde hace varios años que Alberth tiene una finca, ya que cuenta en estos momentos con el propiedad que le heredaron sus padres, pero le falta lo principal para que su negocio surja y para que los vecinos de su comunidad se vean beneficiados.  El proyecto le es muy interesante.

Actualmente Alberth está solicitando un micro crédito de ¢200.000 (doscientos mil colones) para  darle mantenimiento a dicha finca por medio de fertilizantes y herramientas agricolas. Con esto el espera hacer crecer su negocio, ya que su meta es tener un mejor lugar de trabajo donde se pueda instalar bien con sus animales y mejorar tanto su calidad de vida como la de su familia. 

Alberth es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Delirio, una de las 110 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Este será su primer préstamo y con él espera continuar creciendo a nivel personal y económico además de participar activamente en la organización de crédito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Alberth is a 41-year-old man living with his wife and children in La Fuente, Cartago Province.  The main drainage system of this zone is the Reventazón River which arises on Cuericí Hill.  Because of the fertility of the volcanic and alluvial soils, Cartago is a population center that has farming and animal husbandry as its main economic sources.

Alberth has had a farm for several years now since he now owns property his parents passed down to him but he lacks the main thing needed for his business to take off and for his community to be benefitted.  The project is very interesting.

At present, Alberth is asking for a ¢200.000 (two-hundred thousand) colon micro loan to maintain his farm.  He hopes with this to help his business grow because his goal is to have a place of work where he can set himself up well with his animals and improve both his and his family’s quality of life.

Alberth is a member of the “Delirio” (Frenzy) communal bank, one of EDESA’s 110 social organizations in Costa Rica.  This will be his first loan and he hopes with it to continue growing both personally and economically as well as to participate actively in his community’s credit organization.

loans.use: to maintain his farm.

loans.name: Marisol Modesta

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “FUENTE DE VIDA” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Marisol; tiene 41 años de edad,  la socia es soltera; la socia tiene 4 hijos de 20, 18, 16, 15 años de edad; la socia trabaja como comerciante minorista, la socia se dedica  a la compra y venta de ropa, ella requiere el préstamo para invertir en la compra de mercadería, la socia compra prendas de vestir de damas, caballeros y niños, la socia vende a sus amistades y contactos todas las novedades que trae según el cambio de estación, la socia compra la ropa de las fabricas en Lima y Juliaca, la socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de ropa para la venta.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Fuente de Vida” (Fountain of Life) communal bank located in Huanchac District in Cusco Province and Department.

Marisol, 41, is the member.  She’s single and has four children who are 20, 18, 16 and 15 years of age.  She works as a retail merchant buying and selling clothes.  She needs the loan to buy merchandise.  She buys articles of clothing for women, men and children. She sells novel, seasonal items that she brings to her friends and contacts.  She buys the clothes from factories in Lima and Juliaca.  She’s asking for the loan to buy clothes to sell.  She is grateful for the support she’ll get and commits to make her installment payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Francisca Evelia

texts.es: Francisca Evelia tiene 53 años de edad, es amable, honesta y muy conocida en la comunidad, madre soltera de cuatro hijas y de cinco hijos, y reside en el municipio de Manto. Hasta hace 8 años atras Francisca se dedicaba a la cria y destazo de cerdos, horneado de pan y venta de nacatamales, y le iba muy bien con sus ventas pero con el transcurrir del tiempo los años de vida le cayeron encima y se sentia muy cansada para seguir haciendolo ya que son actividades pesadas de realizar, asi que buscó un negocio en el cual no tuviera que esforzarse fisicamente mucho. Actualmente tiene una pequeña venta de abarroteria en general en su casa y con las ganancias que le genera se sostiene economicamente. Su horario de atencion es de lunes a domingo desde temprano por la mañana hasta el anochecer. El financiamiento que Francisca solicita lo necesita para invertirlo en su negocio con la compra de productos de la canasta basica, asi como refrescos, dulces, churros, galletas, entre otros. Con el apoyo de este prestamo espera obtener mejores ingresos para mantener su negocio activo y seguirse sosteniendo. Su mayor desafio es diferenciar su pulperia de las demas que hay en la comunidad, porque hay muchas. Su sueño es llegar a tener un mini-mercadito y asi mejor su condicion de vida. Este es su quinto ciclo en FAMA y ha cancelado sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Francisca Evelia is 53 years old.  She is kind, honest and well known in the community.  She is a single mother with four daughters and five sons and she lives in the town of Manto.  

For eight years Francisca worked raising and butchering pigs, baking bread, and selling tamales.  She did very well with sales but as the years passed she felt too tired to continue doing the same difficult activities.  For this reason, she looked for a business that was less demanding physically.

Francisca currently runs a small general grocery store from her home; the profits it generates support her financially. The store is open Monday to Sunday from early morning until dusk.

The financing Francisca is requesting is needed for investing in her business with the purchase of basic foods, such as soft drinks, candy, churros, and cookies, among others.  With this loan she expects to be able to earn more income to keep her business running and to support herself.  Her biggest challenge is to differentiate her shop from the others in the community, because there are many.

Francisca's dream is to own a mini-market and thereby improve her living conditions. This is her fifth loan cycle with Kiva partner FAMA.  She has paid previous loans on time.

loans.use: to purchase grocery staples.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Yovana

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “FUENTE DE VIDA” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Yovana; tiene 23 años de edad,  la socia es soltera; la socia actualmente estudia en un instituto gastronomía, la socia es estudiante y también hace practicas en su área de tal modo que gana experiencia y también puede ahorrar el dinero que le pagan, la socia desea invertir su crédito en la apertura de su propio negocio, ella desea poner un pequeño negocio y aún no quiere decir que tipo de negocio abrirá por un asunto de cábala;pero tendra mucho que ver con la gastronomia, ella invertira en un negocio relacionado a la elaboración de platos. La socia solicita el préstamo parta aperturar su negocio de comidas.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Fuente de Vida” (Fountain of Life) communal bank located in Huanchac District in Cusco Province and Department.

Yovana, 23, is the member.  She’s single and is currently studying at a gastronomy institute.  She’s a student and also carries out practical exercises in her area of study to gain experience and she’s able to save the money she’s paid for them.  She wants to use the loan to open a small business of her own but because of a Kabala-related issue she doesn’t want to say just yet what kind of business it will be. But the business will have something to do with gastronomy related to food making.  She’s asking for the loan to open her food business.

She is grateful for the support she’ll get and commits to make her installment payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to open a business of her own.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
Marina nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 40 años de edad, ella tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la misma  ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades, ella desde hace 11 años que tiene una molinera, ella compra trigo, habas, cebada y otros granos secos, estos productos los procesa y los convierte en productos alimenticios nutricionales.   
 
Marina requiere el préstamo para compra granos secos como maíz, cebada, trigo, kiwicha y otros más. 

El Banco Comunal “Siempre Adelante” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Marina was born in the city of Cusco (Perú) and she’s 40 years old.  She’s in a common law relationship and has four children.  She currently lives in the city of her birth where she also carries out her activities.  She’s had a mill for the last 11 years.  She buys wheat, broad beans, barley and other dry grains that she processes and turns into nutritional foodstuffs.  Marina needs the loan to buy dry grains like corn, barley, wheat, kiwicha [amaranth] and others.

The “Siempre Adelante” (Always Forward) communal bank meets every thirty days in the city of Cusco (Perú). Cusco is known for tourism, commerce, for its traditional “Inti Raymi” festival and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located here.

loans.use: to buy dry grains.

loans.name: Edith Elizabeth

texts.es:
En el cantón 24 De Mayo de la  provincia de Manabí, conocido por sus paisajes hermosos, por sus bosques, variedad de fauna y por su gente amable y  trabajadora dedicada a la agricultura y ganadería, se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal Mujeres Activas.
 
En este lugar conocimos a la señora Edith, tiene 37 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos,  dos mayores de edad y el menor de 5 años que estudia en escuela, dos de ellos aun viven con ella. Su esposo es chofer.

Nuestra amiga tiene una funeraria en el cual además de ofrecer este servicio también se dedica a la venta de cofres mortuorios, ella hace más de un año  realizo un convenio con el Ministerio de Desarrollo Humano para entregar gratuitamente los cofres y el servicio de funeraria a las personas que reciben el bono del Estado (es un bono que el Gobierno paga mensualmente a las personas de bajos recursos económicos). Este convenio consiste en el Estado entrega gratuitamente este servicio y luego ellos cancelan a los dueños de las funerarias y lugares donde tienen este convenio. Con esto ella ha ganado mucho ya que al ofrecer esta facilidad sus ventas han aumentado. Lleva con su negocio ya 4 años y le está yendo muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar cofres mortuorios. Lleva 4 años  en el Banco Comunal es la fiscal de pagos y le gusta porque sus compañeras son muy cumplidas.
 
Sus sueños son tener otro negocio en otro lugar.
texts.en:
Every 15 days, the Mujeres Activas Communal Bank meets in the 24 de Mayo canton in the province of Manabí. The area is known for its beautiful landscape, forests, faunal diversity and for its friendly and hardworking people who are dedicated to agriculture and cattle raising. 

It is here that Sra. Edith lives. She is 37, married and has three children, two adults and one minor. The youngest is 5 years old and attends school and two of her children still live with her. Her husband is a chauffeur.

Sra. Edith has a funeral home where, aside from offering burial services, she also sells funeral caskets. A little over a year ago she entered into a contract with the Ministry of Human Development to provide free coffins and burial services to people who were subsidized by the state (this is a monthly grant that the government pays low income people). This contract means that the state provides these services free and then pays the funeral home owners who have entered into this agreement.  In this way Sra. Edith has earned a very good income since, by providing this service through the state, her sales have increased. She has had her business for 4 years and is doing very well.

This loan is to buy funeral caskets. She has been a member of the Communal Bank and is the treasurer monitoring payments. She enjoys the job because her fellow members are very conscientious.

Her dream is to have another business in a different place.

loans.use: to buy funeral caskets.

loans.name: Grimaldo

texts.es:
Grimaldo nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 50 años de edad, él está casado y fruto de esta unión tiene tres hijos. Actualmente, él vive en la misma  ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades, él se dedica a la venta de fruta como por ejemplo naranjas, piñas, papayas y otras frutas más. Ya son 15 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. El sueño de Grimaldo es abrir una tienda de frutas en el centro de la ciudad. 

Grimaldo requiere el préstamo para comprar mas fruta como por ejemplo naranjas, piñas y papayas. 

El Banco Comunal “Siempre Adelante” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Grimaldo was born in the city of Cusco (Perú) and is 50 years old.  He’s married and has three children.  He currently lives in the same city where he was born and where he carries out his activities.  He sells fruit like oranges, pineapples, papayas and other fruit, for example.  He’s been in business for fifteen years now and does very well thanks to the effort he puts into his work.  Grimaldo’s dream is to open a fruit market in the center of town.  Grimaldo needs the loan to buy more fruit like, for example, oranges, pineapples and papayas.

The “Siempre Adelante” (Always Forward) communal bank meets every thirty days in the city of Cusco (Perú). Cusco is known for tourism, commerce, for its traditional “Inti Raymi” festival and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located here.

loans.use: to buy more fruit like oranges, pineapples and papayas.

loans.name: Walter Gregorio

texts.es:
Walter nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 45 años de edad, él tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos. Actualmente, él vive en la misma  ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades, él tiene un molinera donde procesa los productos alimenticios a base de trigo, cebada, maíz y otras cosas. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo.  
  
Walter requiere el préstamo para comprar más productos como por ejemplo maíz, cebada, trigo, cebada y otras cosas más. 

El Banco Comunal “Siempre Adelante” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Walter was born in the city of Cusco (Perú) and is 45 years old.  He’s in a common law relationship and has four children.  He currently lives in the same city where he was born and where he carries out his activities.  He has a mill where he processes foodstuffs based on wheat, barley, corn and other things.  He’s been in this business for several years now and does very well thanks to the effort he puts into his work.  Walter needs the loan to buy more products like, for example, corn, barley, wheat, and others.
  
The “Siempre Adelante” (Always Forward) communal bank meets every thirty days in the city of Cusco (Perú). Cusco is known for tourism, commerce, for its traditional “Inti Raymi” festival and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located here.

loans.use: to buy more producs like corn, barley, wheat and others.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El señor Francisco es ya una persona grande de edad y sus hijos ya todos tienen su propia familia. Esta solicitando un préstamo para poder ayudar a sus nietos ha poder en pesar este ciclo escolar y que tengan lo necesario para sus estudio. 
Desea ayudarles con comprar les sus uniformes y los útiles escolares (carpetas, cuadernos, lápices, plumas, cuadernos y mochilas), quiere que sus nietas tengan una carrera profesional para su futuro. 
Don Francisco planea pagar el crédito con el ingreso que obtiene de su pensión gubernamental que obtiene por ser maestro.  
El señor Francisco ya ha tenido un crédito con KIVA el cual realizo sus pagos puntuales, espero contar con su cooperación en este préstamo ya que es para ayudar a sus nietos a tener una buena educación.
texts.en:
Francisco is a person of advanced age and his children all have their own families.  He’s asking for this loan to help his grandchildren start the new school term so that they’ll have everything they need for their studies.  He wants to help them buy their uniforms and school supplies (notebooks, folders, pencils, pens and backpacks).  He wants his granddaughters to have professional careers in the future.

Francisco plans to repay the loan with income he gets from a government pension he gets for being a teacher.  Francisco has already had a KIVA loan that he repaid punctually.  He hopes to have your support again with this loan since it’s to help his grandchildren have a good education.

loans.use: to pay his grandchildren's school costs.

loans.name: Jose Humberto

texts.es:
Jose Humberto tiene 42 años de edad, es transportista, casado y padre de dos hijos, y junto a su familia reside en la Colonia Bella Vista en la ciudad de Danli. 

Jose se dedicaba a ser chofer de transporte pesado y recorria gran parte del pais llevando mercaderia, y casi no pasaba tiempo con su familia, asi que hace tres años atras se le presentó la oportunidad de comprar un numero de taxi y entonces sin pensarlo mucho decidió comprarlo y tambien un carro usado para taxear. Su horario laboral inicia temprano por las mañanas y culmina en la tarde-noche, y como es su propio jefe cuando sus esposa o hijos requieren de su tiempo él felizmente se los dedica. 

El prestamo que está solicitando lo necesita para la compra de llantas y para el arreglo del motor de su unidad. Con el apoyo de este prestamo Jose mantendrá su unidad en buen funcionamiento y podrá seguir teniendo una fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia. Su desafio es ahorrar un poco de los ingresos diarios que le deja la taxeada para poder comprar una unidad nueva y dejar de gastar tanto en el mantenimiento de su actual unidad ya que esta vieja. 

Este es su primer ciclo en FAMA y espera poder cumplir con el compromiso de sus pagos puntualmente.
texts.en:
José Humberto is 42 years old.  He is a truck driver, married, and the father of two children.  He and his family live in Colonia Bella Vista in the city of Danli.  
José transports heavy freight and travels extensively throughout the country carrying merchandise and consequently, hardly spends any time with his family.  So, three years ago, he was presented with the opportunity to purchase a taxi license and then without much thought, decided to buy it as well as a used car for  the taxi service.  His work day begins early in the morning and ends late at night.  As his own boss, when his wife and family need him, he happily sets aside time for them.
He needs the loan to buy tires and to repair the taxi’s engine.  With the support of this loan, José will maintain his vehicle in good condition and will be able to continue having a source of income to support his family.  His challenge is saving a little of his daily income so that he can purchase a new vehicle and stop spending so much on the maintenance of his current vehicle since it is old.
This is his first loan cycle with FAMA and he hopes to be able make his payments on time

loans.use: to pay labor on the repair of his vehicle.

loans.name: Natalie Sheilah

texts.es:
Natalie nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 28 años de edad, ella es madre soltera y tiene un hijo de dos años y medio. Actualmente, ella vive en la misma  ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades, ella se dedica a la distribucion de productos de locería a pedido del cliente. Ya son siete años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien, ella tambien se dedica a brindar servicio de llamadas a celulares móviles.   

Natalie requiere el préstamo para comprar más productos de locería como platos y vasos. 

El Banco Comunal “Siempre Adelante” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Natalie was born in the city of Cusco (Perú) and is 28 years old.  She’s a single mother of a two-and-a-half-year-old son.  She currently lives in the same city where she was born and where she carries out her activities.  She distributes dinnerware based on customer orders.  She’s been in business seven years and does very well.  She also provides cellular telephone services.  Natalie needs the loan to buy more dinnerware items like dishes and glasses.

The “Siempre Adelante” (Always Forward) communal bank meets every thirty days in the city of Cusco (Perú).  Cusco is known for tourism, commerce, its traditional “Inti Raymi” festival and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is locate here.

loans.use: to buy more dinnerware like dishes and glasses.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es:
Concepcion nació en la ciudad de Huaraz del departamento de Ancash (Perú) y tiene 59  años de edad, ella es viuda y tiene tres hijos. Hace 25 años que vive en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realiza sus actividades, ella se dedica a la venta de comida, cerveza y chicha de jora. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la negocio y le va muy bien.

Concepcion requiere el préstamo para comprar más insumos como por ejemplo arroz, fideos y otra parte los destinara para comprar cerveza y jora. 

 El Banco Comunal “Siempre Adelante” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Concepción was born in the city of Huaraz in Ancash Department (Perú) and is 59 years old.  She’s a widow and has three children.  She’s lived in the city of Cusco for the last 25 years which is where she carries out her activities.  She sells food, beer and “chicha de jora” [corn based drink].  She’s been in business for several years and does very well.  Concepción needs the loan to buy more ingredients like rice and noodles and part of it will be used to buy beer and jora.

The “Siempre Adelante” (Always Forward) communal bank meets every thirty days in the city of Cusco (Perú).  Cusco is noted for tourism, commerce, for its traditional “Inty Raymi” festival and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located here.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients like corn and noodles and partly to buy beer and 'jora.'

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria tiene 56 años de edad, es casada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, tiene tres hijas y tres hijos que se dedican a diferentes actividades, reside en la comunidad de La Puzunca.

Desde 1997 Gloria se dedica a la cria y venta de carne de cerdos, inició con la compra de un cerdo pequeño y luego de un tiempo solicitó un prestamo en FAMA y pudo comprar varios mas. Ella aprendió sola y uno de sus vecinos es su proveedor. Gloria se levanta desde muy temprano para realizar el oficio de su hogar y el cuidado de los cerdos, su esposo le ayuda con las actividades que a diario debe realizar como darles suero, concentrado y a lavar el chiquero. Su ventaja es que la inversion que realiza es a corto plazo y pronto puede volver a reinvertirlo. Su desventaja es que varios de sus vecinos se dedican a lo mismo y por temporadas el precio de la carne de cerdo se viene abajo por la excesiva oferta. 

Gloria solicita este prestamo para la compra de dos cerdos y con este apoyo podrá mantener su negocio activo y obtendra ganancias para la mantencion de su familia. Su sueño es tener una porqueriza mas grande. Este es el decimo ciclo de Gloria en FAMA y ha cancelado el pago de sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Gloria is 56 years old and married and her husband is a farmer. She has three daughters and three sons who work at different jobs. She lives in the community of La Puzunca.

Since 1997 Gloria has raised pigs and sold pork. She began by buying a small pig and then after awhile requesting a loan from FAMA so that she could buy several more. She learned on her own and one of her neighbors is her supplier. Gloria gets up very earlier to do her housework and take care of the pigs. Her husband helps her with the daily tasks she has to do, such as giving the pigs their concentrated whey and cleaning the pigsty.

Gloria has an advantage in that the investment she makes is short term and she is quickly able to see a return and re-invest. The drawback is that several of her neighbors are in the same business and the price of pork falls seasonally because of excess supply.

Gloria is requesting this loan to buy two pigs; with this help she will be able to keep her business afloat and earn income to maintain her family. Her dream is to have a larger pig pen. This is Gloria’s tenth loan cycle with FAMA and she has made all of her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
Lucila nació en la ciudad del Cusco del departamento de Cusco (Perú) y tiene 46 años de edad, ella es madre soltera y tiene dos hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas en uno de los mercados de la ciudad del Cusco. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la negocio y le va muy bien.

Lucila requiere el préstamo para comprar más mercadería como por ejemplo naranjas, piñas y otras frutas más. 
 
El Banco Comunal “Siempre Adelante” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Lucila was born in the city of Cusco, Cusco Department (Perú) and is 46 years old.  She’s a single mother of two children.  She currently lives in the city where she was born and where she carried out her activities.  She sells fruit in a market in Cusco.  She’s been in this business for several years now and does very well.  Lucila needs the loan to buy more merchandise like oranges, pineapples and other fruit, for example.

The “Siempre Adelante” (Always Forward) communal bank meets every thirty days in the city of Cusco (Perú).  Cusco is noted for tourism, commerce, for its traditional “Inty Raymi” festival and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located here.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like oranges, pineapples and other fruit, for example.

loans.name: Telica Abajo Group

texts.es:
Aida del Carmen tiene 31 años de edad, es casada su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, tiene cuatro hijos de los cuales tres dependen de ella y se dedican a estudiar en la escuela. 

Desde niña aprendió el oficio de horneado de pan y actualmente lo sigue haciendo. Un dia se le presentó una emergencia economica y no tenia dinero para cubrirla, asi que decidió hornear pan para venderlo diariamente y todas las actividades que implica el hornado las hace ella sola desde las 7:00 am y luego acomoda el pan en una paila y sale a venderlo hasta que termina. Su ventaja es que el pan que elabora es muy rico para acompañarlo con el cafe de las mañanas o tardes y la desventaja es que muchas veces deja el producto al credito y le cuesta recuperar el dinero y tambien en temporada de lluvia no puede vender mucho. 

El prestamo que solicita lo necesita para comprar harina, soda, huevos, margrina, azucar, canela, manteca, esencia coronada, entre otros productos. Con el apoyo de este prestamo podrá elaborar el pan y asi tendrá ganancias y con ello podrá cubrir las necesidades mas basicas de su familia. Su sueño es que dentro de unos años su negocio crezca y tener empleados para poder llevar una vida economicamente tranquila. Este es su segundo ciclo en FAMA y eso le ha permito ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la familia.
texts.en:
Aida del  Carmen is 31 years old.  She is married and her husband is a farmer.  They have four children, three of whom are dependent upon her.  They go to school.

When she was a girl she learned the trade of baking bread, and she currently continues doing so.  One day she had a financial emergency, and she did not have the money to cover it.  That is how she decided to bake bread in order to sell it every day.  She alone does everything that has to do with making the bread starting at 7:00 a.m.  Later she puts the bread in a big pan and leaves to sell it until it is gone.

The advantage that she has is that the bread she makes is quite delicious accompanied with coffee in the mornings or afternoons.  The disadvantage is that many times she leaves the product on credit.  It costs her to recover the money.  Also, during the rainy season she is not able to sell much.

She needs the loan she is requesting to buy flour, eggs, margarine, sugar, cinnamon, shortening, flavoring, and other products.  With the support from this loan she will be able to make bread, and that way she will have more income.  With the income she will be able to cover her family’s most basic necessities.

Her dream is that her business grows within a few years and that she has employees in order to be able to have a financially worry free life.  This is her second cycle with FAMA, and it has allowed her to help her husband support the family.

loans.use: to buy flour, eggs, and soda, etc.

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es: Yanet de 31 años de edad, casada con  Heber de 34 años con quien tiene 2 hijos, ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el barrio de parque industrial del distrito de Pichari.Cuando ya un negocio o actividad al cual uno se dedica  ya no es rentable es necesario cambiarlo de inmediato, porque sino el poco capital que uno tiene lo podría perder, este es el  caso de Yanet, quien a tiempo  se dio cuenta que su negocio de venta de abarrotes ya no le era rentable, porque en la cuadra por donde vive existe muchas tiendas de abarrotes,  es por tal razón que ella, decide dedicarse a comprar y vender animales menores en su propio local que antes era una tienda de abarrotes.Ella está obteniendo una buena cantidad de clientes en el poco tiempo que lleva.  En su tienda no solamente vende este producto si no que a ello añadió  la venta de especerías molidas  por la cual también viene obteniendo buenos ingresos.Ella esta emocionada por el buen ingreso que viene obteniendo  hasta el momento gracias al apoyo de su esposo y sus clientes tan recurrentes.Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que ella ratifica su compromiso de pagar puntualmente sus cuotas.Con los 2,500 ella incrementara su capital de trabajo.Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que ella ratifica su compromiso de pagar puntualmente sus cuotas.Ella es la más alegre en su banco comunal.Con los 2,500 ella comprará mas animales para su posterior venta.
texts.en: Yanet is 31 years old, married to Heber, 34 years old, with whom she has 2 children.  They live in their own house located in the Parque Industrial neighborhood of the Pichari district.  When a business or activity that one is involved with is no longer profitable, an immediate change is necessary, if not, whatever capital one had invested could be lost.  This is the case with Yanet, who in time noticed that her business of selling groceries was no longer profitable because on the block where she lives there are many stores selling groceries.  That is why she decided to buy and sell small animals in her space that previously was the grocery store.  She has acquired many customers in the small time that she has been in business.  She not only sells animals but also added the sale of ground spices which has also provided a good income.  She is excited about the good income that she is earning up until now with the help of her husband and her repeat customers.  This is the second loan with MFP, and she reaffirms her promise to pay her installments on time.  The 2500 PEN will increase her working capital.  She is one of the happiest people at her community bank.  With the 2500 she will buy more animals for their later resale.

loans.use: to purchase more animals for resale.

loans.name: Teodomira

texts.es: Tedomira de 41años de edad, convive con víctor de 38 años con quien tiene 5 hijos, ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el distrito de Pichari. Teodomira es una mujer de coraje que después de los desmanes ocasionados, por la violencia política en el Perú, ella decidió no tenerle miedo a nada por que su corazón ahora es tan dura que esta dispuesta a todo por lograr su objetivo.Ella antes de dedicarse a este negocio trabajaba en el área agrícola cultivando cacao y café, donde si obtenía buenas ganancias.Ahora se dedica a la comercialización de animales menores como son cuyes, gallinas y pavos claro que ya no le es tan forzado como el trabajo en el campo, ahora quien se dedica al cultivo de su campo agrícola es su querido esposo, quien en ocasiones también le brinda su apoyo.Teodomira esta feliz con el trabajo que realiza por que es también una fuente por donde capta buenos ingresos, ella debe de a veces de madrugar para repartir las gallinas alas carderías y recreos campestres quienes son sus clientes potenciales.Pues ella al ver que tiene mucha demanda de estos animales por los recreos y restaurant desea incrementar su capital para poder abastecer ese nicho de mercado insatisfecho decide recurrir y solicitar un crédito.Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que ella ratifica su compromiso de pagar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas.Con los 3000 nuevos soles ella comprara mas animales para su posterior venta.
texts.en:
Teodomira is 41 years old and lives with Victor, with whom she has 5 children. They live in their own house, located in the district of Pichari. Teodomira is a courageous woman who has decided to not be afraid of anything. Following the disorder caused by political violence in Peru, her heart is so hardened that she is ready to do anything to achieve her goals. Before she had this business, she worked in agriculture, cultivating cacao and coffee, and obtained a good income. 

Now she makes her living selling smaller animals like guinea pigs, chickens and turkeys which clearly is not so physically demanding as working in the fields.  At present, her beloved husband is the one who cultivates the fields; on occasions, he also assists her. Teodomira is pleased with the work that she is doing because it is also a good source of income. Sometimes she must wake up very early to distribute chickens to her prospective clients at rustic retreats and workshops where they card wool. Upon seeing that at retreats and restaurants there is a great demand for these animals, she wanted to increase her capital in order to supply this niche market and therefore came to request a loan. 

This is her second loan through MFP, for which she has confirmed her agreement to punctually pay her account. She will buy more animals for resale with the 3000 nuevos soles.

loans.use: to purchase more animals for resale.

loans.name: Tinei

texts.en:
Tinei is 46 years of age and married with eight children. Tinei owns and operates a business venture, planting and harvesting taro for sale. She has 3 years of experience in this business. Tinei needs a loan of 1950 Samoa tala (WST) to hire more workers (at about WST 20/day). She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 350 tala or US $146 per week) to pay for her children's tuition fees.

In 2009, Tinei joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral. This is Tinei's third loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to hire more workers (at about WST 20/day).

loans.name: Kalameli

texts.en:
Kalameli is 38 years old and married with two children. Kalameli owns and operates a business venture, selling fried foods in the local community. She has four years of experience in this business. Kalameli needs a loan of 2500 Samoa tala (WST) to purchase boxes of chicken leg quarters, sausages, mutton flaps, and plastic plates. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 250 talas or US $104 per week) to improve/expand the business.

In 2008, Kalameli joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral. This is Kalameli's fourth loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase boxes of chicken leg quarters, sausages, mutton flaps, and plastic plates.

loans.name: Ledovina

texts.es: Ledovina de 34  años de edad, casada  con Rubén  de 33 años con quien tiene 4 hijos, ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el distrito de Pichari.Ledovina es una  madre de familia con una habilidad muy optima para los negocios ella desde muy joven viene dedicándose a la venta de artefactos cocina prendas de vestir y un poco de zapatos, en la tienda de ella siempre encuentras  de todo, es por ello que ella tiene un ingreso económico muy optimo gracias al apoyo de su querido esposo.Ledovina  esta satisfecha con su labor por que siempre le va muy bien, todo esto gracias al buen trato hacia sus clientes.El único problema que tiene es que, aun no cuenta con un local adecuado para su negocio, por tal razón ella recurre a MFP, a solicitar un crédito donde no dudaron en brindarle esa ayuda ya que ella si esta en la posibilidad de pagar sus aportes muy puntualmente.Este es su primer crédito con MFP, donde ella se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. Ella es la mujer con buenas ideas para su banco comunal. Y la quieren todos.Con los 1.000 nuevos soles ella habilitara un buen local para brindarle una mejor atención a los clientes.
texts.en:
Ledovina is 34 years old and married to Rubén, 33. They have 4 children and live in their own house, located in the district of Pichari. Ledovina is a mother with great business sense. Since she was very young, she has made a living selling kitchen utensils, clothing and some shoes. In her store, you can always find a little of everything. For this reason, she is able to earn a good income thanks to her husband’s support.

Ledovina is pleased with her work because it always goes very well for her, due to the good treatment she gives her customers. The only problem that she has is that she still does not have a suitable location for her store, which is why she came to MFP to request a loan. MFP did not hesitate to provide her this assistance because making the payments punctually is within her means. This is her first loan through MFP, where she has agreed to be punctual in her payments. She is the woman who has good ideas for her communal bank, and they all love her. She will use the 1,000 nuevos soles to set up a good location to provide better service to her customers.

loans.use: to set up a good location to provide better service to her customers.

loans.name: Seata

texts.en:
Seata is 47 years old and married with six children. Seata owns and operates a business venture, planting and harvesting taro for sale. She has 3 years of experience in this business. Seata needs a loan of 2000 Samoa tala (WST) to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 300 talas or US $125 per week) to improve/expand the business.

In 2009, Seata joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral. This is Seata's 3rd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Perelini

texts.en:
Perelini is 27 years of age and married with three children. Perelini owns and operates a business venture catching and selling ocean-caught fish. She has two years of experience in this business. Perelini needs a loan of 1500 WST to purchase additional fish to raise. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 350 talas or US $146 per week) to improve and expand her business.

In 2009, Perelini joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Perelini's second loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to raise

loans.name: Iemaima

texts.en:
Iemaima, a 36-year-old married mother of two children, owns and operates a business venture selling baked goods in the local community. With two years of experience in this business, she is requesting a loan of WST $1500 to purchase sacks of flour and sugar, baking powder, and flavouring. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 190 talas or US $79 per week) to make improvements to her house.

In 2009, Iemaima joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Iemaima's second loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of flour and sugar, baking powder, and flavouring.

loans.name: Suluama

texts.en:
Suluama is 37 years of age and married, with five children. Suluama owns & operates a business venture, selling food products in the local community.  She has 3 years of experience in this business. Suluama needs a loan of WST (Samoa Talas)1600 to purchase new items to expand product offering.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 500 talas or US $208 per week) to improve/expand the business.

Suluama joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Suluama's 4th loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand product offering

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel D. 37 años D. edad, convive con Qallardo D. 42 años D. edad, con quien tiene 3 hijos. Viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el distrito D. Pichari. Maribel es L. persona mas trabajadora y con ganas D. sobresalir juntamente con toda su familia, elL. a los inicios a un cuando era joven se dedicaba al trabajo en el campo, por que sus padres fueron agricultores, al pasar los años elL. por falta D. economía no termino L. secundaria y decidió trabajar como empleada del hogar, ya realizando este oficio es donD. conoce a su querido esposo y forman una familia, y con el poco capital que tuvieron decidieron construir su vivienda para poder vivir tranquilos es donD. tuvieron sus tres queridos hijos que ya para ellos es una gran satisfacción y aL. ves una gran responsabilidad. DesD. entonces a Maribel se le vino en mente que solo trabajando como empleada no podría cubrir los gastos D. L. familia y menos con el poco ingreso que tiene  su esposo en L. agricultura. Por esta razón decidieron incursionar en L. venta D. productos reciclables que en L. actualidad es tan rentable.
Maribel esta a gusto con este oficio que realiza por que le genera buenas ganancias, este oficio lo realiza juntamente con su esposo.Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que elL. se compromete una vez más en efectivizar puntualmente el pago D. sus cuotas.Maribel es L. persona más entusiasta y activa en su banco comunal.Los 2,000 nuevos soles incrementara su capital D. trabajo para productos reciclables
texts.en:
Maribel is 37 years old and lives with Qallardo who is 42 years old. They have 3 children and live in their own house, located in the district of Pichari. Maribel is an extremely hardworking woman who wants to excel, along with the rest of her family. From the very beginning, even when she was young, she maD. her living working in the fields because her parents were farmers. As the years went by, she did not complete her schooling due to a lack of funds and she decided to work as a domestic employee. While working as a domestic employee, she met her beloved husband and they started a family.

They decided to use the little money that they had to build a home so that they could live peacefully along with their three beloved children, who are both a great satisfaction and a great responsibility. Since that time, Maribel had in mind that working as a domestic employee did not enable her to cover her family’s expenses, not even with the small income her husband had from farming. For this reason, they decided to branch out into selling recyclables which currently is very profitable.

Maribel is pleased with this occupation because it brings her a good income, and she works along with her husband. This is her second loan with MFP, and she has again agreed to punctually make her repayments. Maribel is the most enthusiastic and active person in her communal bank. The 2,000 nuevos soles will increase her working capital for the purchase of recyclables.

loans.use: to increase her working capital for recyclable products.

loans.name: Otila

texts.en:
Otila is 50 years of age and married, with six children. Otila owns & operates a business venture, selling specialty food products in the local community.  She has 5 years of experience in this business. Otila needs a loan of WST(Samoa Talas)2900 to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 600 talas or US $250 per week) to improve the general living conditions of her family.

Otila joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Otila's 6th loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale

loans.name: Talafulu

texts.en:
Talafulu is 33 years of age and married, with five children. Talafulu  owns & operates a business venture, selling food products in the local community.  She has 1 year of experience in this business. Talafulu  needs a loan of WST 1000 to purchase additional products to sell.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 400 talas or US $167 per week) to improve/expand the business.

In 2011, Talafulu  joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Talafulu 's 1st loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Pacita

texts.en:
Pacita is a married woman who lives in the town of Sto. Niño, South Cotabato with her family. She is a farmer and has been growing and selling rice for 30 years. Pacita is able to provide for her family through farming.

Pacita is requesting a loan to purchase rice, fertilizers and other farm inputs. She hopes to uplift the living situation of her family through her farming business.

loans.use: to purchase rice, fertilizers and other farm inputs

loans.name: Faavae Setalisa

texts.en:
